trans-unit.source:
I'll leave the search of the Guardian Angel in Amarak Castle to you and Porte.
I'll see what I can find out about that Eye of the Lake that Magiel mentioned. Give my regards to Jee, too!
trans-unit.target:
I'll leave the search of the Guardian Angel in Amarak Castle to you and Porte.
I'll see what I can find out about that Eye of the Lake that Magiel mentioned. Give my regards to Jee, too!

context-group.context:
「アマラーク城での　守護天使捜しは 　と　ポルテちゃんに 　まかせることにするわ。
「私は　守護天使マギエルが　待っているという 　湖の目という場所が　どこなのか調べてみる。 　向こうにいるジーくんに　よろしくね！

trans-unit.resname:
「今度は　メネト村の守護天使とやらを 　捜せばいいんだろ？
「待機ってのは　どうにも　性に合わねえ。 　やることも決まってんだし 　さっさと調査に　出発しようぜ。
trans-unit.source:
Now I'm supposed to be looking for some Guardian Angel in Menet Village?
I don't like just standing around, you know. We've already decided on what to do, so let's hurry up and get a move on!
trans-unit.target:
Now I'm supposed to be looking for some Guardian Angel in Menet Village?
I don't like just standing around, you know. We've already decided on what to do, so let's hurry up and get a move on!

context-group.context:
「今度は　メネト村の守護天使とやらを 　捜せばいいんだろ？
「待機ってのは　どうにも　性に合わねえ。 　やることも決まってんだし 　さっさと調査に　出発しようぜ。

trans-unit.resname:
「メネト村の住民は　ゼニアスの危機について 　何も　知らないままに 　長い間　眠らされていたよね。
「村に初めて行った時　僕には　住人たちが 　恐ろしい呪いに　かかっているように見えたけど 　今は考えが　変わってきているよ。
「とても立ち向かえないほどの　危機ならば 　何も知らず眠っているほうが幸せかもしれない。 　あれは呪いじゃなく　祝福だったのかもってね。
trans-unit.source:
Menet Village's inhabitants have been asleep for so long and know nothing about the crisis that's befallen Zeniath.
When I first arrived in that village, I thought those villagers were stricken with a terrible curse, but now I think I've changed my mind.
If this crisis is too overwhelming to face, then maybe it is better to sleep in ignorance. Maybe it wasn't a curse, but a blessing...
trans-unit.target:
Menet Village's inhabitants have been asleep for so long and know nothing about the crisis that's befallen Zeniath.

trans-unit.resname:
「前回は　エドアルドに　誘拐されたり 　カッコ悪いとこを　見せちまったが 　今回は　そうはいかねえぞ。
「サーカスの花形に　ふさわしい活躍を 　お前さんに　見せてやるよ。 　大船に乗った気で　いてくれよな！
trans-unit.source:
Eduardo kidnapped me and make me look like a real dummy last time. But not this time!
I'll show him a circus performance worthy of the spotlight! Just gotta be confident!
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.resname: <attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ふふっ また <pnplacehold>隊長と 共に 調査ができること うれしく思います。 守護天使捜し がんばりましょうね！
trans-unit.source: <attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr> Hehe...I'm happy that I'm able to keep exploring together with you. Let's do our best in finding those Guardian Angels!
trans-unit.target: <attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr> Hehe...I'm happy that I'm able to keep exploring together with you. Let's do our best in finding those Guardian Angels!

context-group.context: <attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ふふっ また <pnplacehold>隊長と 共に 調査ができること うれしく思います。 守護天使捜し がんばりましょうね！

trans-unit.resname:
「あたしね　調査隊のみんなに　いっぱい 　ニックネームを　つけてきたけど 　自分が　つけてもらったのって　初めてなんだ！
「かわいい　名前をくれた 　ネーしゃまのためにも　守護天使捜し 　がんばろうね　隊長！
trans-unit.source:
I've given nicknames to a bunch of you on the exploration team, but this is the first time someone gave one to me!
Zenny gave me such a cute name, so let's find those Guardian Angels for her sake!
trans-unit.target:
I've given nicknames to a bunch of you on the exploration team, but this is the first time someone gave one to me!

context-group.context:
「あたしね　調査隊のみんなに　いっぱい 　ニックネームを　つけてきたけど 　自分が　つけてもらったのって　初めてなんだ！
「かわいい　名前をくれた 　ネーしゃまのためにも　守護天使捜し 　がんばろうね　隊長！

trans-unit.resname:
「お疲れ様です　隊長。 　次の任務は　ゼニアスの３つの町を回って 　３人の守護天使を　捜すそうですね。
「隊長なら　きっと　見事に 　なしとげてくださると　信じています。 　どうぞ　お気をつけて！
trans-unit.source:
Very good, Captain. I see your next assignment is to travel to the three towns of Zeniath to search for the Guardian Angels.
I have no doubt that you will be able to accomplish such a task. Please be careful out there!
trans-unit.target:
Very good, Captain. I see your next assignment is to travel to the three towns of Zeniath to search for the Guardian Angels.
I have no doubt that you will be able to accomplish such a task. Please be careful out there!

context-group.context:
「お疲れ様です　隊長。 　次の任務は　ゼニアスの３つの町を回って 　３人の守護天使を　捜すそうですね。
「隊長なら　きっと　見事に 　なしとげてくださると　信じています。 　どうぞ　お気をつけて！

trans-unit.resname:
「ここは　花と笑顔が咲きほこる 　とこしえの幸せの町　ムニエカさ。
「えっ　この町の　守護天使について 　何か　知ってることはないかって？ 　あっはっは！　おとぎ話か　何かかい？
「そうだなぁ……町長のエドアルドさんなら 　何か　ご存じかもしれないな。 　町の北にある　ご自宅にいらっしゃるよ。
trans-unit.source:
This is Munieka, the town of eternal happiness where both flowers and smiles bloom!
Huh? Do I know about something called a Guardian Angel in this town? Ahahah! What is that, some kind of fairy tale?
Well...Mr. Eduardo might know something. If you need something from him, he'll be in his house in the north part of town.
trans-unit.target:
This is Munieka, the town of eternal happiness where both flowers and smiles bloom!
Huh? Do I know about something called a Guardian Angel in this town? Ahahah! What is that, some kind of fairy tale?
Well...Mr. Eduardo might know something. If you need something from him, he'll be in his house in the north part of town.

context-group.context:
「ここは　花と笑顔が咲きほこる 　とこしえの幸せの町　ムニエカさ。
「えっ　この町の　守護天使について 　何か　知ってることはないかって？ 　あっはっは！　おとぎ話か　何かかい？
「そうだなぁ……町長のエドアルドさんなら 　何か　ご存じかもしれないな。 　町の北にある　ご自宅にいらっしゃるよ。

trans-unit.resname:
「ムニエカの連中は　相変わらず 　幸せそうに　暮らしてやがるな。 　初めて　来たときは　魅力的に感じたが……。
「すべてを知った　今となっちゃ 　違和感のオンパレードだ。まぁ　俺たちに 　クチ出しする権利なんか　ないんだけどよ。
trans-unit.source:
The people here seem to be just as happy as ever. It was charming the first time I came here, but...
With everything we know now, it's just a constant parade of discomfort. I guess I should just keep my mouth shut.
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.resname: <attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「前回 この町の調査をしたときは 守護天使の話を まったく耳にしませんでした。 信仰が 完全に失われているのでしょうか……？
trans-unit.source: The last time we were here, we didn't hear a thing about any Guardian Angels. Has faith been lost entirely here...?
trans-unit.target: The last time we were here, we didn't hear a thing about any Guardian Angels. Has faith been lost entirely here...?

context-group.context: <attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「前回 この町の調査をしたときは 守護天使の話を まったく耳にしませんでした。 信仰が 完全に失われているのでしょうか……？

trans-unit.resname:
「様　おひさしぶりですぅ。 　ご主人様に　何か　ご用ですかぁ？ 　２階にある私室に　いらっしゃいますけど……。
「……ハッ！　まさか　ドロテアが　何か 　様の　ご不興を買うようなこと 　やらかしちゃいましたか……！？
「ふぇぇ……ごめんなさい　ごめんなさいぃ。 　お願いですから　ご主人様には 　言いつけないでぇ……。
trans-unit.source:
It's been some time, . Do you have business with the Master? He's in his room on the second floor...
Ah...! Could it be...that Mudara has done something to displease you...?!
Eeekkk.... I'm...I'm s-sorry.... Please don't tell the Master...
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.resname: <attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「おや？ 誰かと思えば <pnplacehold>君！ わざわざ 訪ねてきてくれるとは うれしいね。 ついに 人形になる決心が ついたのかなっ？
trans-unit.source:
Oh? I wondered who it was, and look, it's ! I'm glad you finally came back. So, have you decided you
want to become a doll yet?
trans-unit.target:

context-group.context: <attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「おや？ 誰かと思えば <pnplacehold>君！ わざわざ 訪ねてきてくれるとは うれしいね。 ついに 人形になる決心が ついたのかなっ？

trans-unit.resname: 「ちっが～う！ エドアルドさんってば あいかわらずなんだから……。 今日は 聞きたいことがあって 来たの！
trans-unit.source: No way! You haven't changed a bit, have you... We came here to ask you something!
trans-unit.target: No way! You haven't changed a bit, have you... We came here to ask you something!

context-group.context: 「ちっが～う！ エドアルドさんってば あいかわらずなんだから……。 今日は 聞きたいことがあって 来たの！

trans-unit.resname: <attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「しゅご……天使？ なんだねそりゃ？ この町の町長になって だいぶ経つが 守護天使なんて 聞いたことがないなぁ……。
trans-unit.source: <attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>Guardian...Angel? What's that? I've been mayor of this town for quite some time, but this is the first I'm hearing of it...
trans-unit.target: <attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>Guardian...Angel? What's that? I've been mayor of this town for quite some time, but this is the first I'm hearing of it...

context-group.context: <attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「しゅご……天使？ なんだねそりゃ？ この町の町長になって だいぶ経つが 守護天使なんて 聞いたことがないなぁ……。

trans-unit.resname:
「えー　そんなぁ！ 　この町にいると　思うんだけどなあ……。
「ちょっとでもいいから　心当たりはない？ 　なんて言うかこう……天使！ 　って感じの　不思議な存在とか……。
trans-unit.source:
Huh? Seriously?! They have to be here somewhere...
Do you have any idea? Even the tiniest bit? How should I put this...an angel! You know, some kind of mysterious
being, or...

「ちょっとでもいいから　心当たりはない？ 　なんて言うかこう……天使！ 　って感じの　不思議な存在とか……。

trans-unit.resname:
「不思議な存在……まさか……？ 　でも　もし　この話が本当なら……。
「くっ……くく……くっくっく……。 　くっくっく……あーっはっはっはっはっはッ！！
trans-unit.source:
A mysterious being...? Could it be... But, if what you say is true, then...
He...hehe...hehehehe... Hmm hmm...Aaahahahahaha!
trans-unit.target:

「くっ……くく……くっくっく……。 　くっくっく……あーっはっはっはっはっはッ！！

trans-unit.resname: 「エ エドアルドさん！ いきなり どうしたの？ もしかして 故障でもしちゃった！？
trans-unit.source: Umm...Eduardo?! What just happened? Did you break or something?
trans-unit.target: Umm...Eduardo?! What just happened? Did you break or something?

context-group.context: 「エ エドアルドさん！ いきなり どうしたの？ もしかして 故障でもしちゃった！？

trans-unit.resname:
「故障だって？　とんでもない！　最高の気分さ！ 　ようやく　僕の夢が実現する瞬間が 　やってくるのだからね！
「じつは　キミたちが言う　守護天使に 　ひとつだけ　心当たりがあるんだ。 　フフン　気になるだろうが　まだ秘密さ。
「で　その守護天使を　見つけるために 　どうしても　必要なものが　あってね……。 　悪いけど　キミたち　採ってきてくれないかな？
「以前　森で　泉の水を汲んできてもらったろう？ 　あの森の北には　特別な宝石が採れる 　洞くつがあるんだ。
「そこにあるモノの中で　もっとも美しい…… 　神秘的な輝きを放つ　エメラルドを 　採ってきてくれたまえ！
「フッフッフ…… 　何に使うかは　後でのお楽しみさ！ 　それじゃ　頼んだよ！
trans-unit.source:
Break? Not a chance! I feel amazing, actually! Finally, the moment has come where my dreams will come true!
I think I have an idea about the Guardian Angel you guys are talking about. Hmm hmm... I know you're curious, but it's a secret.
So, to find them, there's something I absolutely need first... Sorry, but could you do me a favor and go get it?
You remember the forest where you got the spring water, right? To the north of there is a cave where you can get special gemstones.
Please get me an emerald that glows all mysteriously! Of all the things there, it is the most beautiful...
Hee hee hee... You'll see what it's used for later! Alrighty, then! I'm counting on you!
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.resname: 「おっと 失礼。 だが できれば 急いでくれないか？ これ以上の お預けをくらうのは ごめんだよ。
trans-unit.source: Oops, sorry...but could you hurry this up? I'd rather not be kept waiting any longer. Sorry!
trans-unit.target: Oops, sorry...but could you hurry this up? I'd rather not be kept waiting any longer. Sorry!

context-group.context: 「おっと 失礼。 だが できれば 急いでくれないか？ これ以上の お預けをくらうのは ごめんだよ。

trans-unit.resname:
「ああ　ありがとう……！ 　これで　やっと　僕の夢がかなうよ！
「前に　話したろう？ 　不思議なチカラで　このムニエカを 　救ってくれた　旅人の女性のことを。
「彼女の名は　ルーミリア。 　僕は　キミたちの言う守護天使とは 　彼女のことなんじゃないかと　にらんでる。
「キミたちは　守護天使が 　この町にいると言ったね？　だが　彼女の姿は 　どこにも見当たらない。それは　なぜか？
「キミたちの話を聞いて　僕はこう考えた。 　彼女は　いなくなったのではなく 　見えなくなってしまったのでは　ないかと。
「そうッ！　彼女は　きっと 　かつての僕らと同じように　肉体を失い 　魂だけの存在となって　町のどこかにいるのだ！
「つまーり！　彼女が失った身体を　用意できれば 　ルーミリア……キミたちが捜している 　守護天使の復活が　かなうってワケさ！
「そして　肝心の身体だが…… 　ふっふっふ……安心したまえ！ 　じつは　もうすでに　作ってあるッ！
trans-unit.source:
Ah, thank you...! Finally, my dreams will come true!
I told you before, right? About the traveler who saved Munieka with her mysterious power?
Well, her name is Lumeria. My guess is that she is the Guardian Angel that you are searching for.
You said this town has a Guardian Angel, didn't you? But she's nowhere to be found. So why is that?
After hearing your story, I started thinking. Maybe she isn't gone, but instead just invisible.
That's right! She must have lost her body, just like we once did, and her soul is wandering around somewhere in town!
In other words! If we can find the body she lost, then...the angel you are searching for will surely come back to life!
As for that oh-so-important body... Hehehe... No need to worry! In fact, I've already created one!
trans-unit.target:
Ah, thank you...! Finally, my dreams will come true!
I told you before, right? About the traveler who saved Munieka with her mysterious power?
Well, her name is Lumeria. My guess is that she is the Guardian Angel that you are searching for.
You said this town has a Guardian Angel, didn't you? But she's nowhere to be found. So why is that?
After hearing your story, I started thinking. Maybe she isn't gone, but instead just invisible.
That's right! She must have lost her body, just like we once did, and her soul is wandering around somewhere in town!
In other words! If we can find the body she lost, then...the angel you are searching for will surely come back to life!
As for that oh-so-important body... Hehehe... No need to worry! In fact, I've already created one!

trans-unit.resname:
「この人形は　まだ未完成でね。 　いちばん大事なパーツ……彼女の 　神秘的で　美しい瞳が　入っていないんだ。
「キミたちが　採ってきてくれた 　この宝石をいれることで　ようやく完成する。 　僕の愛しい人……美しきルーミリアが……。

The doll is still not finished. It's missing its most important part...her mysterious, yet beautiful eyes.

trans-unit.resname:
「僕は　どうしても 　もう一度　ルーミリアに会いたいんだ。 　どうか　キミたちのチカラを　貸しておくれ！
「ムニエカ地方の東の高台に　かつて 　ルーミリアが暮らしていた小屋がある。そこに 　何か　手がかりが　残っているかもしれない。
「僕も　あそこを　散々調べてはみたんだが 　残念ながら　何もつかめなかった。キミたちなら 　何か　わかることもあるかもしれない……。
「あー　でも今は　はしごが落ちていて 　空でも飛ばないと　小屋には行けないんだった。 　……まぁ　なんとかしてくれたまえ。うん！
trans-unit.source:
I absolutely must see her again! Please help me!
East of Munieka is a cabin on a cliff where Lumeria used to live. There may be some clues left behind there.
I've looked around that place myself, but sadly wasn't able to find anything. Maybe you'll have better luck than I did...
Ah, but...the ladder is gone, so you'll have to fly to get to the cabin. Well, I'm sure you'll figure something out. Yup!

trans-unit.resname:
「エドアルドのヤツ 　相変わらず　思いこみが激しいっていうか 　強引なヤツだよなぁ。
「ま　他に　天使の手がかりもないし 　ここは　エドアルドの案に　乗っかるとするか。
「しかし　想い人そっくりの人形を　作って 　ずっと　部屋に置いておくとか……。 　重い……愛が重すぎるぜ……。
「ルーミリアも　やっこさんの 　そういうとこに　愛想が尽きて 　出ていっちまったんじゃないのかねぇ？
trans-unit.source:
That Eduardo...he's as intense and forceful as ever, isn't he...
Well, we got no other leads on that angel, so we'll just have to go with his idea for now.
But making a doll that looks exactly like the person he loves and keeping it in his room? That's...heavy. His love's just
way too crazy...
Maybe it just got to be too much, and Lumeria got fed up with it and left?

trans-unit.resname:
「あの人形に　ルーミリアさんの魂を入れれば 　守護天使が　復活する……。 　うまくいくと　良いのですが……。
「しかし　エドアルドさんを見ていると 　なんだか　ベサワキを　思いだしますね。 　人の話を聞かないところなど　特に……。
「崇拝する相手の　人形を作ってしまうほどの 　情熱には　圧倒させられますが　その熱意を 　他のことに　向けられないものでしょうか？
trans-unit.source:
If you put Lumeria's soul into that doll, then the Guardian Angel will be revived... I really hope that it works...
But when I look at Eduardo, he reminds me of Besawaki. Especially the way that he just totally ignores what other people say...
His passion is just too overwhelming...enough to even make a doll of the person he loves. Can't he use that passion elsewhere?

「ああっ　チュピちゃんったら　もう！ 　皆さんの　邪魔をしないよう 　おとなしくしててくださいよぅ……？
「様。ご主人さまに言われた通り 　お部屋の中を調べて　ルーミリア様の手がかりを 　探しましょう……。
trans-unit.source:
Ahh, Chupie, you're so mean!! Could you please stay quiet and out of everyone's way...?

「もしかして　チュピちゃんは 　ルーミリアさんについて 　何か　知っているのではないでしょうか？
「チュピちゃんから　何か 　事情を聞けたら　良かったのですが…… 　残念ながら　言葉が通じませんものね……。

trans-unit.resname:
「う～ん　うぅ～～～ん？ 　……あーんっ！　やっぱり　ダメだぁ！
「守護天使っぽい気配を　追ってみようと 　さっきからずっと　がんばってるんだけど 　全っ然　わかんないや。
「うーん　なんだろうなぁ……？ 　あたしたちの　すぐ近くにいる気もするんだけど 　とにかく　気配が弱すぎて……。
「お師匠様だったら　こんなの 　簡単に　見つけちゃうんだろうなぁ。 　あ～あ　くやしいなぁ……。
trans-unit.source:
Hmm? Hmmmmmm? Ah! No good!
I've been trying to follow that angel-like presence for awhile now, but I can't seem to pinpoint it at all...
Hrrrmm... I wonder what it could be...? It feels like it's right next to us, but the presence is just too faint...
I'm sure my Master would be able to find it easily. Ah, it's so frustrating...

trans-unit.resname:
誰かの　日記のようだ。 美しいが　どこか弱々しい文字で つづられている。　
今日は　特別なお役目を賜りし　記念すべき日。 これから始まる　かけがえのない毎日を忘れぬため 日記を　したためることにします。
ムニエカは　すばらしい町。 初めて見たときから 私は　この町に　夢中でした。
町中に花が咲きみだれ　人間たちが歌い踊り 幸せそうに　笑っている……。
人間は　本当に　不思議で素敵な生き物。 自らの手で　幸せと笑顔を創りだすことが できるのですから。
私の故郷には存在しない　生の営み……。 なんと尊く　美しい輝きなのでしょう。
ムニエカの町は　かけがえのない　私の宝物。 何があっても　この平和を　 永遠に守ってみせます。
trans-unit.source:
It looks to be someone's diary. It's written in beautiful, yet delicate characters.
Today is a memorable day, as I have been given a special role. To ensure I never forget these irreplaceable days that begin from now, I have
decided to keep a diary.
Munieka is a wonderful town. From the first time I saw it, it completely captivated me.
Flowers bloom all over the town, and its people sing and dance, laughing happily...
Humans are truly mysterious and wonderful creatures. They can create happiness and smiles with their own hands.
In my homeland, there is no such vibrant life... How precious and beautiful it truly is.
Munieka is my irreplaceable treasure. No matter what happens, I will protect this peace forevermore.
trans-unit.target:
It looks to be someone's diary. It's written in beautiful, yet delicate characters.
Today is a memorable day, as I have been given a special role. To ensure I never forget these irreplaceable days that begin from now, I have
decided to keep a diary.

Flowers bloom all over the town, and its people sing and dance, laughing happily...
Humans are truly mysterious and wonderful creatures. They can create happiness and smiles with their own hands.
In my homeland, there is no such vibrant life... How precious and beautiful it truly is.
Munieka is my irreplaceable treasure. No matter what happens, I will protect this peace forevermore.

trans-unit.resname:
「ルーミリアさんは　ムニエカの町と住民を 　心から　愛していたのですね。文章全体から 　町への想いが　伝わってくるようです。
「でも　ここまで　ムニエカの町を 　愛していたにも　かかわらず　どうして 　姿を　消してしまったのでしょうか……？
trans-unit.source:
Lumeria loved Munieka and its people with all her being. You can just feel her affection throughout her writing.
But if she truly loved Munieka so much, then why did she leave...?
trans-unit.target:
Lumeria loved Munieka and its people with all her being. You can just feel her affection throughout her writing.
But if she truly loved Munieka so much, then why did she leave...?

context-group.context:
「ルーミリアさんは　ムニエカの町と住民を 　心から　愛していたのですね。文章全体から 　町への想いが　伝わってくるようです。
「でも　ここまで　ムニエカの町を 　愛していたにも　かかわらず　どうして 　姿を　消してしまったのでしょうか……？

trans-unit.resname: 他にも ルーミリアの手がかりがないか 部屋の中を 探してみよう。
trans-unit.source: Search the room for any other clues about Lumeria.
trans-unit.target: Search the room for any other clues about Lumeria.

context-group.context: 他にも ルーミリアの手がかりがないか 部屋の中を 探してみよう。

trans-unit.resname:
「……なぁ　。 　ルーミリアを　捜すことになってから 　ドロテアが　元気なさそうに見えるんだが……。
「無理もねぇ。好きな相手の想い人が 　帰ってくるかも　しれないんだもんな。 　わかるだろ？　失恋確定ってヤツさ。
「だが　そういう痛みを経験して　みんな 　大人になっていくんだ。その時は　俺たちで 　ドロテアを　なぐさめてやらねえとな。
trans-unit.source:
Say, ... Mudara's been in a pretty bad mood since we got here...
I understand, though. The person she likes might have his true love come back... You get it, right? It's a guaranteed heartbreak.
But...everyone has to experience that kinda pain growing up. When the time comes, we'll just have to be there for her.
trans-unit.target:
Say, ... Mudara's been in a pretty bad mood since we got here...
I understand, though. The person she likes might have his true love come back... You get it, right? It's a guaranteed heartbreak.
But...everyone has to experience that kinda pain growing up. When the time comes, we'll just have to be there for her.

trans-unit.resname: 「<pnplacehold>様。ご主人さまに言われた通り お部屋の中を調べて ルーミリア様の手がかりを 探しましょう……。
trans-unit.source: As the Master instructed, let's search this room for any clues about Lumeria...
trans-unit.target: As the Master instructed, let's search this room for any clues about Lumeria...

context-group.context: 「<pnplacehold>様。ご主人さまに言われた通り お部屋の中を調べて ルーミリア様の手がかりを 探しましょう……。

trans-unit.resname: 大量の手紙がある。 すべて エドアルドから ルーミリアに 宛てたもののようだ。
trans-unit.source: It's a giant stack of letters. They all seem to be from Eduardo and addressed to Lumeria.
trans-unit.target: It's a giant stack of letters. They all seem to be from Eduardo and addressed to Lumeria.

context-group.context: 大量の手紙がある。 すべて エドアルドから ルーミリアに 宛てたもののようだ。

trans-unit.resname:
ルーミリア　キミは　僕の太陽……。 キミがいなければ　僕の世界は 闇に閉ざされて　しまうだろう。
ああ　ルーミリア……愛しきキミよ……。 その名を　クチにするだけで 胸が高鳴って　どうにかなってしまいそうだ！
僕は　キミの　愛のしもべ……。 僕のような男が　キミのそばに　はべることを どうか　許してほしい……。
trans-unit.source:
Lumeria, you are my sun... Without you, my world would be shrouded in darkness.
Oh, Lumeria... My beloved... Just saying your name makes my heart flutter! I'm just so crazy about you!
I am a servant to your love... Please allow a man such as my myself to be by your side...
trans-unit.target:
Lumeria, you are my sun... Without you, my world would be shrouded in darkness.
Oh, Lumeria... My beloved... Just saying your name makes my heart flutter! I'm just so crazy about you!
I am a servant to your love... Please allow a man such as my myself to be by your side...

context-group.context:
ルーミリア　キミは　僕の太陽……。 キミがいなければ　僕の世界は 闇に閉ざされて　しまうだろう。
ああ　ルーミリア……愛しきキミよ……。 その名を　クチにするだけで 胸が高鳴って　どうにかなってしまいそうだ！
僕は　キミの　愛のしもべ……。 僕のような男が　キミのそばに　はべることを どうか　許してほしい……。

trans-unit.resname: ルーミリアに対する 熱烈な愛情が 大仰な詩的表現を 用いて 長々と つづられている……。
trans-unit.source: His passionate love for Lumeria is written at length with grandoise, yet poetic writing...
trans-unit.target: His passionate love for Lumeria is written at length with grandoise, yet poetic writing...

context-group.context: ルーミリアに対する 熱烈な愛情が 大仰な詩的表現を 用いて 長々と つづられている……。

trans-unit.resname:
「エドアルドさん……本当に 　ルーミリアさんに　ベタぼれなんだね。 　内容は　かなり　引いちゃうレベルだけど……。
「でも　こうやって　大事に取ってあるあたり 　ルーミリアさん　エドアルドさんのこと 　まんざらでも　なかったんじゃないかなぁ。
trans-unit.source:
Eduardo... He's really head over heels for Lumeria, isn't he? His writing is pretty shocking though...
But if she kept all of these letters like this, I guess she wasn't completely opposed to him.
trans-unit.target:
Eduardo... He's really head over heels for Lumeria, isn't he? His writing is pretty shocking though...
But if she kept all of these letters like this, I guess she wasn't completely opposed to him.

context-group.context:
「エドアルドさん……本当に 　ルーミリアさんに　ベタぼれなんだね。 　内容は　かなり　引いちゃうレベルだけど……。
「でも　こうやって　大事に取ってあるあたり 　ルーミリアさん　エドアルドさんのこと 　まんざらでも　なかったんじゃないかなぁ。

trans-unit.resname:
誰かの　日記のようだ。 美しいが　どこか弱々しい文字で つづられている。
……結晶の侵略者が飛来した　地獄の日。 ムニエカの町を　任された身でありながら 私は　町を守りきることが　できませんでした。
結晶のバケモノたちが　無惨にも 町のすべてを破壊しつくし　住民たちは　全員 肉体を失い　魂だけの存在となってしまった。
住民たちの魂の光が　だんだんと弱まっている。 早くしないと　天に召されて 跡形もなく　消えてしまうでしょう……。
ムニエカの町は　私の宝物…… 大好きなみんなを　失いたくなんかない……。 嫌です　嫌です……どうすれば……。
……ふと　思いだしました。 いつだったか　赤髪の人形師さんが言っていた。 『壊れてしまったら　直せばいいだけさ』と。
幸い　住民たちの魂は　まだ無事です。 新しい身体さえ用意できれば　この地に眠る 創生のチカラで　生き返らせることができるかも。
見よう見まねですが　やってみましょう。 ずっとずっと　あの人形師さんを見てきたから 作り方は　覚えています……。
trans-unit.source:
It looks to be someone's diary. It's written in beautiful, yet delicate characters.
...The day of hell when the crystalline invaders has arrived. Despite being entrusted with Munieka, I couldn't protect it.
The crystalline monsters ruthlessly destroyed everything in the town, and everyone lost their physical forms, becoming mere souls.
The light of the residents' souls is gradually weakening. If I don't act quickly, they will pass on and disappear without a trace...
Munieka is my treasure... I don't want to lose everyone I love... I hate this, I hate this... What should I do...?
...I suddenly remembered. Once, a red-haired dollmaker said, "If it breaks, you just have to fix it."
Fortunately, the residents' souls are still intact. If I can prepare new bodies, I might be able to bring them back to life using the
power of creation that lies in this land.
I will try mimicking what I've seen. I've watched that dollmaker for a long time, so I remember how to make them...
trans-unit.target:
It looks to be someone's diary. It's written in beautiful, yet delicate characters.
...The day of hell when the crystalline invaders has arrived. Despite being entrusted with Munieka, I couldn't protect it.
The crystalline monsters ruthlessly destroyed everything in the town, and everyone lost their physical forms, becoming mere souls.
The light of the residents' souls is gradually weakening. If I don't act quickly, they will pass on and disappear without a trace...
Munieka is my treasure... I don't want to lose everyone I love... I hate this, I hate this... What should I do...?
...I suddenly remembered. Once, a red-haired dollmaker said, "If it breaks, you just have to fix it."
Fortunately, the residents' souls are still intact. If I can prepare new bodies, I might be able to bring them back to life using the
power of creation that lies in this land.
I will try mimicking what I've seen. I've watched that dollmaker for a long time, so I remember how to make them...

見よう見まねですが　やってみましょう。 ずっとずっと　あの人形師さんを見てきたから 作り方は　覚えています……。

trans-unit.resname:
「エドアルドからも　ちろっと聞いてはいたが 　かつて　この町で起こった事件ってのは 　想像を絶するものだったようだな……。
「ルーミリアが　どんな手を使ってでも 　住民たちを　救いたかったって気持ちは 　よくわかるぜ。俺だって　そうだったからな。
「だが……ヒトが壊れたら　直せばいいって 　考えに至ったのが　モヤモヤするんだよな。 　命ってのは　そんな安いもんじゃねえよ……。
trans-unit.source:
Eduardo told us a bit about it, but what happened to that town is just unimaginable...
I understand why Lumeria wanted to save its residents by any means necessary. I felt it, too.
But...I'm still not on board with the idea that if someone is broken, you can just "fix" 'em. Life ain't that cheap...
trans-unit.target:
Eduardo told us a bit about it, but what happened to that town is just unimaginable...
I understand why Lumeria wanted to save its residents by any means necessary. I felt it, too.
But...I'm still not on board with the idea that if someone is broken, you can just "fix" 'em. Life ain't that cheap...

trans-unit.resname: 「うう……ひと通り 調べましたが ルーミリア様の行方を示す 手がかりは 見つからないですねぇ……。
trans-unit.source: *sob*... We've looked all over, but we still don't have any idea where Lumeria is...
trans-unit.target: *sob*... We've looked all over, but we still don't have any idea where Lumeria is...

context-group.context: 「うう……ひと通り 調べましたが ルーミリア様の行方を示す 手がかりは 見つからないですねぇ……。

trans-unit.resname: 「チュピィ！ チュチュチュピィ！！
trans-unit.source: Chupie! Chu-chu-chupie!
trans-unit.target: Chupie! Chu-chu-chupie!

trans-unit.target: What is it, Chupie...? Is there something in the ceiling...?

context-group.context: 「チュピちゃん どうしたんですかぁ？ 天井に 何かあるんですぅ……？

trans-unit.resname: 「チュピ チュッピィ♪
trans-unit.source: Chupie, chupie! ♪
trans-unit.target: Chupie, chupie! ♪

context-group.context: 「チュピ チュッピィ♪

trans-unit.resname: チュピちゃんは なんだか 得意げだ。
trans-unit.source: Chupie looks proud of herself.
trans-unit.target: Chupie looks proud of herself.

trans-unit.resname:
は ルーミリアの日記を　読んでみた。
ムニエカの地下にある　秘密の場所を開くための 鍵を託した　住民の名前と その取り出し方が　書いてある……。
trans-unit.source:
reads Lumeria's Diary.
It contains the names of the residents who were each entrusted with a key to the secret place beneath Munieka, as well
as instructions on how to obtain them...
trans-unit.target:
reads Lumeria's Diary.
It contains the names of the residents who were each entrusted with a key to the secret place beneath Munieka, as well

は ルーミリアの日記を　読んでみた。
ムニエカの地下にある　秘密の場所を開くための 鍵を託した　住民の名前と その取り出し方が　書いてある……。

trans-unit.resname:
鍵を託した住民は　セアトロさん　オルーサさん そして　ロベールさん。
セアトロさんに　託した 鍵の取り出し方は　以下の通り。
右ウデを　上にあげ 左手の親指を　曲げ 首を　前にかたむける。
trans-unit.source:
The residents who were entrusted keys are Seatro, Orusa, and Robere.
The way to retrieve the key from Seatro is as follows:
-Raise your right hand. -Bend your left hand thumb. -Tilt your head forward.
trans-unit.target:
The residents who were entrusted keys are Seatro, Orusa, and Robere.
The way to retrieve the key from Seatro is as follows:
-Raise your right hand. -Bend your left hand thumb. -Tilt your head forward.

context-group.context:
鍵を託した住民は　セアトロさん　オルーサさん そして　ロベールさん。
セアトロさんに　託した 鍵の取り出し方は　以下の通り。
右ウデを　上にあげ 左手の親指を　曲げ 首を　前にかたむける。

trans-unit.resname:
「むー？　へんてこりんな　取り出し方だね。 　住民の人に　このポーズを取らせると 　鍵が　もらえるってことなのかな？
「さっそく　セアトロさんに頼んで 　やってもらおう。へんてこなポーズだから 　間違えないように　注意しないとね！
trans-unit.source:
Huh? That's a weird way to get it... So if we make this resident do this pose, we'll get a key?
Let's go and ask Seatro to do it. It's a weird pose, so we gotta make sure we don't mess it up!
trans-unit.target:
Huh? That's a weird way to get it... So if we make this resident do this pose, we'll get a key?
Let's go and ask Seatro to do it. It's a weird pose, so we gotta make sure we don't mess it up!

reads Lumeria's Diary.
It contains the names of the residents who were each entrusted with a key to the secret place beneath Munieka, as well
as instructions on how to obtain them.
The way to retrieve the key from Seatro is as follows:
-Raise your right arm. -Bend your left hand thumb. -Tilt your head forward.
Speak with Seatro and ask him to make the specified pose.

セアトロに　話しかけ 指定のポーズを　取ってもらおう。

trans-unit.resname:
「ここは　花と笑顔が咲きほこる 　とこしえの幸せの町　ムニエカさ。
「セアトロさんを　捜してるのかい？ 　あの人なら　そこの階段をのぼった先に 　いるはずだよ。
trans-unit.source:
This is Munieka, the town of eternal happiness where both smiles and flowers bloom!
You're looking for Seatro? He should be right up the stairs.
trans-unit.target:
This is Munieka, the town of eternal happiness where both smiles and flowers bloom!
You're looking for Seatro? He should be right up the stairs.

trans-unit.source: Oh, good day to you, <pnplacehold>! Do you need something from me?

trans-unit.resname: セアトロに 指定のポーズを 取ってほしいと 頼みますか？<yesno><close>

trans-unit.target: Have Seatro make a specific pose?<yesno><close>

context-group.context: セアトロに 指定のポーズを 取ってほしいと 頼みますか？<yesno><close>

trans-unit.resname: 「困ったことがあったら 遠慮なく 言ってくださいね あなたは 私の恩人なんですから！
trans-unit.source: If you need anything, just let me know! You are my benefactor, after all!
trans-unit.target: If you need anything, just let me know! You are my benefactor, after all!

context-group.context: 「困ったことがあったら 遠慮なく 言ってくださいね あなたは 私の恩人なんですから！

trans-unit.resname: 「ほほー ポーズですか。 あなたが振り付けたダンスの 一部ですかね。 興味深い！ やってみましょう！
trans-unit.source: Hoho, a pose, I see! Is it part of a dance you're choreographing? How interesting! I'll give it a try!
trans-unit.target: Hoho, a pose, I see! Is it part of a dance you're choreographing? How interesting! I'll give it a try!

context-group.context: 「ほほー ポーズですか。 あなたが振り付けたダンスの 一部ですかね。 興味深い！ やってみましょう！

trans-unit.resname: <pnplacehold>は セアトロに 取ってほしいポーズを 伝えた！
trans-unit.source: <pnplacehold> instructs Seatro how to pose!
trans-unit.target: <pnplacehold> instructs Seatro how to pose!

context-group.context: <pnplacehold>は セアトロに 取ってほしいポーズを 伝えた！

trans-unit.resname: 「こう……ですかね。よいしょっと。
trans-unit.source: Like...this? Well, here we go.
trans-unit.target: Like...this? Well, here we go.

context-group.context: 「こう……ですかね。よいしょっと。

trans-unit.resname: セアトロは <pnplacehold>の指示通り ポーズを取った……。
trans-unit.source: Seatro poses by <pnplacehold>'s instructions...
trans-unit.target: Seatro poses by <pnplacehold>'s instructions...

context-group.context: セアトロは <pnplacehold>の指示通り ポーズを取った……。

trans-unit.resname: 「うーん 指示通りにやってみましたが なんだか しっくりこないというか……。 本当に これで あってます？
trans-unit.source: Hmm...I did as you said, but something doesn't feel quite right... Are you sure that's the right way?
trans-unit.target: Hmm...I did as you said, but something doesn't feel quite right... Are you sure that's the right way?

context-group.context: 「うーん 指示通りにやってみましたが なんだか しっくりこないというか……。 本当に これで あってます？

trans-unit.resname: どうやら ポーズの指定を 間違えてしまったようだ。ルーミリアの日記を読み 正しいポーズを 確認しよう。
trans-unit.source: The pose you instructed was not correct. Check Lumeria's Diary again to find the correct pose.
trans-unit.target: The pose you instructed was not correct. Check Lumeria's Diary again to find the correct pose.

context-group.context: どうやら ポーズの指定を 間違えてしまったようだ。ルーミリアの日記を読み 正しいポーズを 確認しよう。

trans-unit.resname: 突然 セアトロが ガタガタと震えだした！
trans-unit.source: Suddenly, Seatro began to shake violently!
trans-unit.target: Suddenly, Seatro began to shake violently!

context-group.context: 突然 セアトロが ガタガタと震えだした！

trans-unit.resname: 「ギ……ガガガガ……。 カシャン カシャ ガガガガガガ……。 ……パカッ！
trans-unit.source: W...Whirrrrr... Kachunk, kachunk, whiirrr... Pop!
trans-unit.target: W...Whirrrrr... Kachunk, kachunk, whiirrr... Pop!

context-group.context: 「ギ……ガガガガ……。 カシャン カシャ ガガガガガガ……。 ……パカッ！

trans-unit.resname: セアトロのクチが パカッと開くと なんと 中から 小さなパーツが飛び出てきた！ どうやら これが 扉の鍵のようだ。<bw_break>
trans-unit.source: Seatro's mouth opens, and out popped a small part. This must be the key to the door!<bw_break>
trans-unit.target: Seatro's mouth opens, and out popped a small part. This must be the key to the door!<bw_break>

context-group.context: セアトロのクチが パカッと開くと なんと 中から 小さなパーツが飛び出てきた！ どうやら これが 扉の鍵のようだ。<bw_break>

trans-unit.resname: ふたつめの鍵の 入手方法を調べるため だいじなものから ルーミリアの日記を 読んでみよう。
trans-unit.source: Read Lumeria's Diary again to see how to get the second key.
trans-unit.target: Read Lumeria's Diary again to see how to get the second key.

context-group.context: ふたつめの鍵の 入手方法を調べるため だいじなものから ルーミリアの日記を 読んでみよう。

trans-unit.resname:
「うーん　なんだか　さっきのポーズを取ってから 　身体中が　ぐらぐらするような……？ 　ちょっと　気持ち悪いですねぇ……。
「おや？　オルーサさんに　用があるのですか？ 　あの方の家なら　町の東ですよ。
trans-unit.source:
Hrmm...for some reason, my whole body feels all shaky after making that pose... It's a bit creepy...
Oh? You say you need Orusa for something? His house is on the east side of town.
trans-unit.target:
Hrmm...for some reason, my whole body feels all shaky after making that pose... It's a bit creepy...

trans-unit.resname: 「おんや アンタ…… こんな老いぼれに 何か用かい？
trans-unit.source: Hey, you... Is there something you need from an old timer like me?
trans-unit.target: Hey, you... Is there something you need from an old timer like me?

context-group.context: 「おんや アンタ…… こんな老いぼれに 何か用かい？

trans-unit.resname: オルーサに 指定のポーズを 取ってほしいと 頼みますか？<yesno><close>

trans-unit.target: Have Orusa make a specific pose?<yesno><close>

context-group.context: オルーサに 指定のポーズを 取ってほしいと 頼みますか？<yesno><close>

trans-unit.resname: 「なんにもない家だけど 良ければ ゆっくりしていくといい。 若者の訪問は わしには いい刺激さね。
trans-unit.source: There isn't much here, but feel free to relax yourselves. Having young people visit always perks me up.
trans-unit.target: There isn't much here, but feel free to relax yourselves. Having young people visit always perks me up.

context-group.context: 「なんにもない家だけど 良ければ ゆっくりしていくといい。 若者の訪問は わしには いい刺激さね。

trans-unit.resname:
は ルーミリアの日記を　読んでみた。
ムニエカの地下にある　秘密の場所を開くための 鍵を託した　住民の名前と その取り出し方が　書いてある。
オルーサさんに　託した 鍵の取り出し方は　以下の通り。
左足を　後ろに下げ 右目を　閉じ 右耳を　ひっぱる
オルーサに　話しかけ 指定のポーズを　取ってもらおう。
trans-unit.source:
reads Lumeria's Diary.
It contains the names of the residents who were each entrusted with a key to the secret place beneath Munieka, as well
as instructions on how to obtain them.
The way to retrieve the key from Orusa is as follows:
-Put your left foot back. -Close your right eye. -Pull on your right ear.
Speak with Orusa and ask her to make the specified pose.
trans-unit.target:
reads Lumeria's Diary.
It contains the names of the residents who were each entrusted with a key to the secret place beneath Munieka, as well
as instructions on how to obtain them.
The way to retrieve the key from Orusa is as follows:
-Put your left foot back. -Close your right eye. -Pull on your right ear.
Speak with Orusa and ask her to make the specified pose.

trans-unit.resname: 「やった～！ ふたつめのパーツも ゲット！！ 残るは あと１個だけど 日記に書いてあった ロベールさんって どこにいるんだろうね？
trans-unit.source: Yes! We got the second part! There's just one left, but I wonder where that Robere person is?
trans-unit.target: Yes! We got the second part! There's just one left, but I wonder where that Robere person is?

context-group.context: 「やった～！ ふたつめのパーツも ゲット！！ 残るは あと１個だけど 日記に書いてあった ロベールさんって どこにいるんだろうね？

trans-unit.resname:
「これで　日記に記されていたパーツが 　全部そろったね。あとは　地下への入り口が 　どこにあるか　突きとめるだけなんだけど……。
「うーん　このパーツの形…… 　町のどっかで　見たような気がするんだよね。 　こんな形の歯車が　いっぱいあるところ……。
「　町の中で 　このパーツが　はめられそうな場所　探そうっ。 　形を　よーく見れば　どこかわかるかも！
trans-unit.source:
Now we have all the parts mentioned in the diary. All we have to do now is find out how to get underground...
Hmm...this part's shape... I feel like I've seen it somewhere in town before. There's a place with a lot of gears...
Look around town for a place this part piece can fit. I'm sure you can figure it out if you look carefully!
trans-unit.target:
Now we have all the parts mentioned in the diary. All we have to do now is find out how to get underground...
Hmm...this part's shape... I feel like I've seen it somewhere in town before. There's a place with a lot of gears...

「ハハッ　やだねぇ　アンタ。 　それなら　すぐそばに　あるじゃないか。 　ほら　この広場にあるアレだよ。

What? You're saying you can't find the place with a lot of gears?

trans-unit.resname:
は　３つのパーツを 穴に　差し込もうとしたが　同じパーツを ２回以上　つけることは　できないようだ。
だいじなものから　パーツをしらべて それぞれの穴に　対応する形を 確認してみよう。
trans-unit.source:
tries inserting the three parts. It appears they can't insert the same part more than once.
Check each part in your Key Items to see which shape fits each hole.
trans-unit.target:
tries inserting the three parts. It appears they can't insert the same part more than once.

trans-unit.resname:
「やっと……戻ってこれた……。 　ムニエカの　みんなを救うために……。 　町の地下深くに隠した　アレを……。
「でも　今の私に　先に進む資格はない……。 　取りもどさなければ　欠けた記憶を……。
「ムニエカの住民たちとの　記憶…… 　どれも　私の大切な宝物。 　ひとつたりとも　失ってはならなかったモノ。
「記憶の修繕を……。 　西の扉を出て　光の道をたどり　保管庫へ……。 　思いだして　私の……。
trans-unit.source:
Finally...I have returned...to save everyone in Munieka... The thing I hid deep under the town...
But as am I now, I cannot proceed further... I must retrieve my missing memories...
The memories of the people of Munieka... each one is a precious treasure. Not a single one should have been lost.
Repair my memories... Through the west door, follow the path of light to the vault... Remember my...
trans-unit.target:
Finally...I have returned...to save everyone in Munieka... The thing I hid deep under the town...
But as am I now, I cannot proceed further... I must retrieve my missing memories...
The memories of the people of Munieka... each one is a precious treasure. Not a single one should have been lost.
Repair my memories... Through the west door, follow the path of light to the vault... Remember my...

trans-unit.resname:
「今日は　ムニエカの町の方々が 　私の……を　……てくれました。その中で 　……が　すばらしかったです。
「ダンセさんは　踊りの名手。 　舞台中央で　華麗に　舞いおどる。 　その姿は　……のよう。
「ツェルトさんは　舞台の下手に立ち 　……の楽器を　響かせる。……で……な音色に 　思わず　……が動いてしまいます。
「上手には　ムニエカの歌姫　カネレさん。 　歌詞は……かなり……で　……が難しいですが 　透きとおった　……は　まさに……です。
「ムニエカの皆の　……のこもった　贈り物……。 　私は　……のことを　絶対に……せん。
trans-unit.source:
Today, the people of Munieka held a... Among their...were truly wonderful.
Danse is a master of dance. She dances elegantly in the center of the stage. Her form is like...
Zelto stands stage left, playing... ...cheerful melody made...move all on its own.
At stage right is Munieka's diva, Kanere. The lyrics are quite...and difficult, but her beautiful voice...truly...
The heartfelt gifts...everyone in Munieka...will never...forget...
trans-unit.target:
Today, the people of Munieka held a... Among their...were truly wonderful.
Danse is a master of dance. She dances elegantly in the center of the stage. Her form is like...

trans-unit.resname:
「今のは　ムニエカの町の誰かの　記憶か？ 　だが　ところどころ　ノイズが入っていやがる。 　コイツを　修繕しろってことか。
「３つの装置に　それぞれ　投影されてるのは 　ムニエカの町の　住民のようだな。 　コイツを　今の話通りに　置いてみようぜ。
「ちなみに　舞台の上手と下手って　知ってるか？ 　観客側から見て　右側が上手　左側が下手だ。 　神の右手って覚えると　わかりやすいぜ。
trans-unit.source:
Was that a memory from someone in Munieka? It was kinda fuzzy, though... Looks like we gotta fix it then, huh?
It looks like what's bein' projected from those devices are Munieka's residents. We should place them based on that story.
By the way, do ya know how stage directions work? From the audience's perspective, the right side is stage right and the left side
is stage left. Simple, right?
trans-unit.target:
Was that a memory from someone in Munieka? It was kinda fuzzy, though... Looks like we gotta fix it then, huh?
It looks like what's bein' projected from those devices are Munieka's residents. We should place them based on that story.
By the way, do ya know how stage directions work? From the audience's perspective, the right side is stage right and the left side
is stage left. Simple, right?

context-group.context:
「今のは　ムニエカの町の誰かの　記憶か？ 　だが　ところどころ　ノイズが入っていやがる。 　コイツを　修繕しろってことか。

trans-unit.resname:
「今日は　ムニエカの町の方々が 　私の歓迎会を　開いてくれました。その中で 　披露してくれた出し物が　すばらしかったです。
「ダンセさんは　踊りの名手。 　舞台中央で　華麗に　舞いおどる。 　その姿は　風にひらひら舞う　花びらのよう。
「ツェルトさんは　舞台の下手に立ち 　自慢の楽器を　響かせる。軽快で楽しげな音色に 　思わず　身体が動いてしまいます。
「上手には　ムニエカの歌姫　カネレさん。 　歌詞は……かなり独特で　理解が難しいですが 　透きとおった　美しい歌声は　まさに芸術です。
「ムニエカの皆の　心のこもった　贈り物……。 　私は　この日のことを　絶対に忘れません。
trans-unit.source:
Today, the people of Munieka held a welcome party for me. Among their performances, some were truly wonderful.
Danse is a master of dance. She dances elegantly in the center of the stage. Her form is like fluttering flower petals.
Zelto stands stage left, playing his prized instrument. Its light and cheerful melody made my body move all on its own.
At stage right is Munieka's diva, Kanere. The lyrics were quite unique and difficult to grasp, but her beautiful voice was truly
artistic.
The heartfelt gifts from everyone in Munieka... I will never forget this day.
trans-unit.target:
Today, the people of Munieka held a welcome party for me. Among their performances, some were truly wonderful.
Danse is a master of dance. She dances elegantly in the center of the stage. Her form is like fluttering flower petals.
Zelto stands stage left, playing his prized instrument. Its light and cheerful melody made my body move all on its own.
At stage right is Munieka's diva, Kanere. The lyrics were quite unique and difficult to grasp, but her beautiful voice was truly
artistic.
The heartfelt gifts from everyone in Munieka... I will never forget this day.

「バンボラさんが　ふたりの間に立ち 　……ましたが　……はおさまらず 　……に　暮れてしまいました……。

context-group.context:
「……は　住民から住民へと　……していく。 　……そうに　……いた　町のみんなの……が 　どんどん　……っていく……。

「すべて　……のせいだ！ 　……が来なければ　オレたちは 　……のままで　……のに！
「ノキオさんの　向かいに立っていた 　リオネさんが　……調子で 　……に　賛同する……。

「バンボラさんが　ふたりの間に立ち 　……ましたが　……はおさまらず 　……に　暮れてしまいました……。

trans-unit.resname:
「ケガレは　住民から住民へと　伝染していく。 　幸せそうに　笑っていた　町のみんなの顔が 　どんどん　曇っていく……。
「あの日は　ノキオさんの様子が　おかしかった。 　怒りや悲しみに　心を支配され 　制御できない感情を　周囲にまき散らしていた。
「すべて　あの女のせいだ！ 　あの女が来なければ　オレたちは 　人間の身体のままで　いられたのに！
「ノキオさんの　向かいに立っていた 　リオネさんが　激しい調子で 　彼の意見に　賛同する……。
「そうよ！　人形の身体になったせいで 　私のかわいい娘は　大人になることも 　できなくなってしまったのよ！
「バンボラさんが　ふたりの間に立ち 　なだめようと試みましたが　怒りはおさまらず 　途方に　暮れてしまいました……。
trans-unit.source:
The taint spreads from resident to resident... Everyone's happy faces are slowly becoming more and more clouded...
Noccio was acting strangely that day. His heart was filled with anger and sadness, and he spread these emotions to those
around him.
"It's all that woman's fault! If she had never come here, then we would have been able to keep our human bodies!"
Lione, who stood opposite of him, fervently agreed with his words...
"That's right! Since we all became dolls, my beautiful daughter will never be able to grow up!"
Banbora tried standing between them and calming them down, but the anger did not quell, leaving her at a loss of what to do...
trans-unit.target:
The taint spreads from resident to resident... Everyone's happy faces are slowly becoming more and more clouded...
Noccio was acting strangely that day. His heart was filled with anger and sadness, and he spread these emotions to those
around him.
"It's all that woman's fault! If she had never come here, then we would have been able to keep our human bodies!"
Lione, who stood opposite of him, fervently agreed with his words...
"That's right! Since we all became dolls, my beautiful daughter will never be able to grow up!"
Banbora tried standing between them and calming them down, but the anger did not quell, leaving her at a loss of what to do...

context-group.context:

「あの日は　ノキオさんの様子が　おかしかった。 　怒りや悲しみに　心を支配され 　制御できない感情を　周囲にまき散らしていた。

「バンボラさんが　ふたりの間に立ち 　なだめようと試みましたが　怒りはおさまらず 　途方に　暮れてしまいました……。

trans-unit.resname:
「おひさしぶりです　殿！ 　この国に残ってくださった 　ジーガンフ殿は　お元気ですよ。
「ぜひ　会いにいってください！ 　ジーガンフ殿は　アマラーク城 　地下１階の　兵士訓練場にいらっしゃいます。
trans-unit.source:
Good to see you again, ! Sir Jiganf has been doing well since he decided to stay here.
Please, you should go and see him! He should be in the Soldier Training Grounds in the castle basement.
trans-unit.target:
Good to see you again, ! Sir Jiganf has been doing well since he decided to stay here.
Please, you should go and see him! He should be in the Soldier Training Grounds in the castle basement.

context-group.context:
「おひさしぶりです　殿！ 　この国に残ってくださった 　ジーガンフ殿は　お元気ですよ。
「ぜひ　会いにいってください！ 　ジーガンフ殿は　アマラーク城 　地下１階の　兵士訓練場にいらっしゃいます。

trans-unit.resname:
「アマラーク城へ　ようこそ！ 　ジーガンフ殿の指南を　受けるのでしたら 　地下の　兵士訓練場へ…………
「おお　殿！ 　あなた様に　フーラズーラとの 　戦い方の指南は　不要でしたね。
「ですが　ぜひ　兵士訓練場にいる 　ジーガンフ殿に　会いにいってください。 　きっと　よろこびますよ。
trans-unit.source:
Welcome to Amarak Castle! If you'd like to receive training from Sir Jiganf, then make your way to the basement training grounds...
Oh, ! Of course you don't need any training on how to defeat the Fluzula.
But you should definitely go and see Sir Jiganf. I'm sure he'll be delighted to see you.

trans-unit.resname:
「やれやれ……すまん　。 　ナーディラは　年の割に　賢すぎるというか…… 　したたかな部分が　あってな。
「だが　ウソをつくような娘ではない。 　守護天使の居場所を　知ってるというのも 　本当だろう。
「悪いが　ナーディラと話し 　お願いとやらを　聞いてやってくれ。
trans-unit.source:
Good grief... Sorry, . Nadira's just too smart for her age and she's got a pretty cunning side to her...
But she also isn't the kind of girl to lie. I'm sure she really does know where the Guardian Angel is.
I hate to ask, but could you please listen to what she has to say?
trans-unit.target:
Good grief... Sorry, . Nadira's just too smart for her age and she's got a pretty cunning side to her...
But she also isn't the kind of girl to lie. I'm sure she really does know where the Guardian Angel is.
I hate to ask, but could you please listen to what she has to say?

Rizk is a great man. I'm sure by eating something delicious, he can relieve even just a little of his daily fatigue.

trans-unit.source:
The first thing that comes to mind is a Quick Cake... You can make it as a cook yourself, or get it from the Cooking Guild in Orphea.
Next is an Acrobatic Cake...that's also in Orphea, but you have to buy it inside the train station.
Then there's the Star Sweets, but only cooks can make those. Otherwise, you have to buy one on the Traveler's Bazaar.
The simplest way is probably just buying a Quick Cake or Acrobatic Cake from Orphea. No need to go crazy, right?

trans-unit.source:
Thanks for all your help! Since you helped me with both of our requests, I'll tell you where the Guardian Angel is!
It's hiding in the area between the Stahl Minefield and the Turbia Meadows...in the Riverside Rest Area!
But, some advice from me...if you say Nadira told you the location, then the angel should show up.
Go near the treasure chest in the Riverside Rest Area and try using the "Call" emote!

trans-unit.resname:
「さん！　イルシームから 　聞きましたよ。フーラズーラが　この国に 　一斉攻撃を　仕掛けようとしていると……。
「そこで　ジーガンフさんや　城の者を招集し 　緊急会議で　知恵をしぼった結果 　私たちは　ひとつの作戦を　立てました。
「それは　フーラズーラへの先制攻撃…… 　やつらが　我が国に　攻め入るより前に 　我々が　やつらの本体を　倒すのです！
「この作戦には　さんの 　おチカラが　不可欠。 　どうか　ご協力を　お願いします。
「……さて　守護天使殿によると　本体は 　ハディン採石場の地下に　潜んでいるとか。 　それを　直接　たたきに行くのです！
「ただし　本体のもとへ　たどり着くまでに 　無数のフーラズーラが 　行く手を　阻むはず……。
「そこで　さん　イルシーム 　ジーガンフさんの　主戦力にくわえ 　城の兵士たちも　多数　同行させます。
「もはや　兵士たちは　食われるだけの 　存在ではない。あなたがたを　補佐するため 　勇敢に　戦うでしょう！
「
trans-unit.source:
! I heard from Ilseem that the Fluzula are planning on launching a coordinated assault on Amarak...
So, I called together Jiganf and the people of the castle for an emergency meeting, and we came up with a plan.
We decided on a pre-emptive strike on the Fluzula...we'll defeat their main body before they can invade us here!
Your help is essential for this plan. I humbly ask for your cooperation.
According to the Guardian Angel, their main body lies underground in the Hadine Quarry. We'll attack them directly!
However, before we can reach the main body, we're sure to be attacked by countless Fluzula...
Therefore, in addition to you, Illseem, and Jiganf's forces, I will send some of the castle's soldiers to aid you.
The soldiers are no longer there only to be eaten. They will assist you in your fight!
One last thing...once this operation begins, you will not be able to return to Amarak for some time.
When you are both mentally and physically prepared, would you come and speak with me again?
trans-unit.target:
! I heard from Ilseem that the Fluzula are planning on launching a coordinated assault on Amarak...
So, I called together Jiganf and the people of the castle for an emergency meeting, and we came up with a plan.
We decided on a pre-emptive strike on the Fluzula...we'll defeat their main body before they can invade us here!
Your help is essential for this plan. I humbly ask for your cooperation.
According to the Guardian Angel, their main body lies underground in the Hadine Quarry. We'll attack them directly!
However, before we can reach the main body, we're sure to be attacked by countless Fluzula...
Therefore, in addition to you, Illseem, and Jiganf's forces, I will send some of the castle's soldiers to aid you.
The soldiers are no longer there only to be eaten. They will assist you in your fight!
One last thing...once this operation begins, you will not be able to return to Amarak for some time.
When you are both mentally and physically prepared, would you come and speak with me again?

context-group.context:
「さん！　イルシームから 　聞きましたよ。フーラズーラが　この国に 　一斉攻撃を　仕掛けようとしていると……。
「そこで　ジーガンフさんや　城の者を招集し 　緊急会議で　知恵をしぼった結果 　私たちは　ひとつの作戦を　立てました。
「それは　フーラズーラへの先制攻撃…… 　やつらが　我が国に　攻め入るより前に 　我々が　やつらの本体を　倒すのです！
「この作戦には　さんの 　おチカラが　不可欠。 　どうか　ご協力を　お願いします。
「……さて　守護天使殿によると　本体は 　ハディン採石場の地下に　潜んでいるとか。 　それを　直接　たたきに行くのです！
「ただし　本体のもとへ　たどり着くまでに 　無数のフーラズーラが 　行く手を　阻むはず……。
「そこで　さん　イルシーム 　ジーガンフさんの　主戦力にくわえ 　城の兵士たちも　多数　同行させます。
「もはや　兵士たちは　食われるだけの 　存在ではない。あなたがたを　補佐するため 　勇敢に　戦うでしょう！
「……さん。 　この作戦が　始まれば 　しばらく　アマラーク王国には　入れません。
「心と身体の　準備がととのったら 　私に　声をかけてくださいますか？ 　よろしく　お願いします。

trans-unit.resname: 「……申し訳ありませんが お急ぎを。 守護天使殿によると フーラズーラの襲撃まで 時間が ないそうですから。
trans-unit.source: Apologies, but you must hurry. The Guardian Angel says we don't have much time before the Fluzula attack.
trans-unit.target: Apologies, but you must hurry. The Guardian Angel says we don't have much time before the Fluzula attack.

context-group.context: 「……申し訳ありませんが お急ぎを。 守護天使殿によると フーラズーラの襲撃まで 時間が ないそうですから。

trans-unit.resname: 「ありがとうございます <pnplacehold>さん！ さて そうと決まれば 忙しくなる……！
trans-unit.source: Thank you, <pnplacehold>! Now that that's decided, it's time to take action!
trans-unit.target: Thank you, <pnplacehold>! Now that that's decided, it's time to take action!

context-group.context: 「ありがとうございます <pnplacehold>さん！ さて そうと決まれば 忙しくなる……！

trans-unit.resname:
「ああ　さん。 　先ほどは　お恥ずかしいところを…… 　つい　感情的になってしまいました。
「ところで　イルシームを知りませんか？ 　姿が　見えなくなってしまって…… 　よろしければ　捜してくださいませんか？
trans-unit.source:
Ah, ... I'm a little embarrassed about what I said earlier. Things got pretty emotional.
By the way, do you know where Ilseem is? He slipped away... Do you think you could go look for him?
trans-unit.target:
Ah, ... I'm a little embarrassed about what I said earlier. Things got pretty emotional.
By the way, do you know where Ilseem is? He slipped away... Do you think you could go look for him?

context-group.context:
「ああ　さん。 　先ほどは　お恥ずかしいところを…… 　つい　感情的になってしまいました。
「ところで　イルシームを知りませんか？ 　姿が　見えなくなってしまって…… 　よろしければ　捜してくださいませんか？

trans-unit.resname:
「王さま　部下の人たちの前では 　いつも冷静で　よゆう～な感じなのに 　さっきは　めずらしく　怒ってたね。
「でも　だからこそ　兵士さんたちも 　気持ちを動かされたんだと　思うな！
trans-unit.source:
His Majesty is always really calm and collected in front of his subjects. But he got really angry this time... That's not like
him.
But I think because of that, his soldiers were pretty moved by his speech!
trans-unit.target:
His Majesty is always really calm and collected in front of his subjects. But he got really angry this time... That's not like
him.
But I think because of that, his soldiers were pretty moved by his speech!

context-group.context:
「王さま　部下の人たちの前では 　いつも冷静で　よゆう～な感じなのに 　さっきは　めずらしく　怒ってたね。
「でも　だからこそ　兵士さんたちも 　気持ちを動かされたんだと　思うな！

trans-unit.resname:
「リズク王は　オレやイルシームとは 　気さくに　言葉を交わす。 　そのときは　立場を感じさせない。
「だが　先ほどの　胸を打つ演説…… 　やはり　彼は　王なのだと思わされた。 　……立派な王だ。
trans-unit.source:
King Rizk talks to both me and Ilseem in quite a friendly manner. It's hard to notice his status when he does.
But that speech just now...it was pretty moving. It made me realize he really is a king. A fine king...
trans-unit.target:
King Rizk talks to both me and Ilseem in quite a friendly manner. It's hard to notice his status when he does.
But that speech just now...it was pretty moving. It made me realize he really is a king. A fine king...

context-group.context:
「リズク王は　オレやイルシームとは 　気さくに　言葉を交わす。 　そのときは　立場を感じさせない。

trans-unit.resname: テラスに出る 扉のようだ。 開けてみますか？<yesno><close>

trans-unit.source: <pnplacehold> makes their way towards Amarak Castle.
trans-unit.target: <pnplacehold> makes their way towards Amarak Castle.

context-group.context: <pnplacehold>は アマラーク城下町へ 向かおうとした。

trans-unit.resname:
「もーっ　！ 　戻る時間は　ないってば！
「一刻も早く　フーラズーラを倒さなきゃ。 　ハディン採石場の　最深部へ行こう！
trans-unit.source:
C'mon, ! This is no time to be going back!
We have to beat the Fluzula as soon as possible! Let's head to the deeper part of the Hadine Quarry!
trans-unit.target:
C'mon, ! This is no time to be going back!
We have to beat the Fluzula as soon as possible! Let's head to the deeper part of the Hadine Quarry!

context-group.context:
「もーっ　！ 　戻る時間は　ないってば！
「一刻も早く　フーラズーラを倒さなきゃ。 　ハディン採石場の　最深部へ行こう！

trans-unit.resname:
「よし……ハディン採石場の　最深部まで来たな。 　ここから　さらに　フーラズーラの 　本体が潜む　地下洞くつへ　進めるのだ。
「。一番奥にある 　大岩を　しらべてくれ。
trans-unit.source:
Good...we've reached the deepest part of the Hadine Quarry. The Fluzula's main body lies deeper in the underground cavern.
, please go and examine that large rock in the back.
trans-unit.target:
Good...we've reached the deepest part of the Hadine Quarry. The Fluzula's main body lies deeper in the underground cavern.
, please go and examine that large rock in the back.

context-group.context:
「よし……ハディン採石場の　最深部まで来たな。 　ここから　さらに　フーラズーラの 　本体が潜む　地下洞くつへ　進めるのだ。
「。一番奥にある 　大岩を　しらべてくれ。

trans-unit.resname:
「……かつて　アマラークの人々が　この地を 　採石場として　利用していた。そして　偶然 　地下洞くつへの入り口が　開いてしまったのだ。
「それを感知した　フーラズーラの本体が 　大量のフーラズーラを　送り込み 　甚大な被害が　発生した……。
「そして　採石場は　閉鎖された。 　その際　洞くつへの入り口も　ふさがれたのだ。 　この　大岩でな……。
「今の我には　大岩を動かす　チカラはない。 　だが　人間たちの使っていた 　機器を使えば……。
trans-unit.source:
Long ago, Amarak's people used this area as a quarry. By chance, they opened the way to the underground cavern.
Sensing this, the Fluzula's main body sent a massive swarm of Fluzula, causing much damage...
Because of that, the quarry was closed off. The entrance to the cavern was then sealed off with a large rock.
Right now, I lack the strength to move it. Using the humans' equipment, though... I may be able to move it.
trans-unit.target:
Long ago, Amarak's people used this area as a quarry. By chance, they opened the way to the underground cavern.
Sensing this, the Fluzula's main body sent a massive swarm of Fluzula, causing much damage...
Because of that, the quarry was closed off. The entrance to the cavern was then sealed off with a large rock.
Right now, I lack the strength to move it. Using the humans' equipment, though... I may be able to move it.

context-group.context:
「……かつて　アマラークの人々が　この地を 　採石場として　利用していた。そして　偶然 　地下洞くつへの入り口が　開いてしまったのだ。

trans-unit.resname: 地下洞くつへ 進めるようになった！
trans-unit.source: You can now proceed to the underground cavern!
trans-unit.target: You can now proceed to the underground cavern!

context-group.context: 地下洞くつへ 進めるようになった！

trans-unit.resname: <pipipi_npc 12262>「うわあ……！
trans-unit.source: <pipipi_npc 12262>Whoa...!
trans-unit.target: <pipipi_npc 12262>Whoa...!

context-group.context: <pipipi_npc 12262>「うわあ……！

trans-unit.resname: <camera_to_npc 12262> 「すごーい！ あっちに おっきな湖があるよ！
trans-unit.source: <camera_to_npc 12262> Amazing! There's a huge underground lake over there!
trans-unit.target: <camera_to_npc 12262> Amazing! There's a huge underground lake over there!

context-group.context: <camera_to_npc 12262> 「すごーい！ あっちに おっきな湖があるよ！

trans-unit.resname: 「地底湖というやつだな。 それも かなり 巨大な……。 目的地が 対岸でないことを 願うばかりだが。
trans-unit.source: An underground lake... It's pretty big, too... Let's hope our destination isn't on the other side.
trans-unit.target: An underground lake... It's pretty big, too... Let's hope our destination isn't on the other side.

context-group.context: 「地底湖というやつだな。 それも かなり 巨大な……。 目的地が 対岸でないことを 願うばかりだが。

trans-unit.resname: 「じつに 残念だが…… フーラズーラの本体は この湖の 向こうだ。
trans-unit.source: Actually, that's... That's where the main body of the Fluzula is.
trans-unit.target: Actually, that's... That's where the main body of the Fluzula is.

context-group.context: 「じつに 残念だが…… フーラズーラの本体は この湖の 向こうだ。

trans-unit.resname: 「うへえ やっぱり……。 どうしよう？ 泳いで渡る……のは 無理だよね？
trans-unit.source: Ugh, figures... What should we do? Swimming across is a no-go, right?
trans-unit.target: Ugh, figures... What should we do? Swimming across is a no-go, right?

context-group.context: 「うへえ やっぱり……。 どうしよう？ 泳いで渡る……のは 無理だよね？

trans-unit.resname: 「そうだな……迂回するしかなさそうだ。 洞くつを進み 別の道を 探すことにしよう。
trans-unit.source: Hmm... Looks like we'll have to find a different way. Let's keep looking around.
trans-unit.target: Hmm... Looks like we'll have to find a different way. Let's keep looking around.

context-group.context: 「そうだな……迂回するしかなさそうだ。 洞くつを進み 別の道を 探すことにしよう。

trans-unit.resname:
「よもや……ぬしら　ヒトの子かえ！？ 　して　なにゆえ　かような場所に？
「……ほほう。フーラズーラの本体を　倒しに？ 　しかし　湖を渡れずに　困っていると……。
「あいにくじゃが　迂回路などは　存在せぬ。 　向こう側に行きたくば　湖を渡るしか 　方法はないが……ヒトには　難儀であろうなあ。
「しかし　朗報じゃぞ　ヒトの子よ。 　わらわも　フーラズーラとは 　折り合いが悪い……というか　大嫌いでな！
「やつら　攻撃は効かぬし　歯向かう魔物は食うし 　厄介にもほどがある！　倒すと言うのなら 　湖を渡るのに　協力してやってもよいぞえ。
「じゃが……ぬしら 　本当に　フーラズーラを　倒せるのか？ 　確認させてもらうとしよう。
「この洞くつにいる　フーラズーラを 　そうじゃな……３匹　倒してみせよ！
「それができたなら　ぬしらを 　わらわの　背中に乗せて 　湖を　渡らせてやろうぞ！
trans-unit.source:
Ye are...humans?! What brings ye to such a place?
Hoho...so ye are here to defeat the main body of the Fluzula? Ye seem to be having trouble in crossing that lake...
Unfortunately, there be no other ways. If ye wish to go to the other side, ye must cross the lake. No easy task for a human.
However, I bring good tidings, humans... I have a strong dislike...no, a deep hatred for the Fluzula!
They're immune to all attacks and devour any who oppose them. Quite the nuisance! If ye really mean to defeat them, I suppose I
can help ye in crossing the lake.
But...can ye truly defeat them? I must know for certain.
The Fluzula who dwell in this cavern... I want ye to defeat three of them!
If ye can do that, then I'll allow ye to ride on my back and help ye in crossing the lake!
trans-unit.target:
Ye are...humans?! What brings ye to such a place?
Hoho...so ye are here to defeat the main body of the Fluzula? Ye seem to be having trouble in crossing that lake...
Unfortunately, there be no other ways. If ye wish to go to the other side, ye must cross the lake. No easy task for a human.
However, I bring good tidings, humans... I have a strong dislike...no, a deep hatred for the Fluzula!
They're immune to all attacks and devour any who oppose them. Quite the nuisance! If ye really mean to defeat them, I suppose I
can help ye in crossing the lake.
But...can ye truly defeat them? I must know for certain.
The Fluzula who dwell in this cavern... I want ye to defeat three of them!
If ye can do that, then I'll allow ye to ride on my back and help ye in crossing the lake!

「この洞くつにいる　フーラズーラを　３匹…… 　倒すことができたなら　ぬしらを 　背中に乗せて　湖を　渡らせてやろうぞ！

trans-unit.resname: 「……ん。なんじゃ わらわに 言いたいことが ありそうな顔じゃな。

trans-unit.target: ...Hm? What's this? Have ye something to say to me?

trans-unit.source: What...? I don't understand you humans.
trans-unit.target: What...? I don't understand you humans.

context-group.context: 「なんじゃ……ヒトの子は よう わからんの。

context-group.context: ガメゴンの背中に 乗せてもらい 地底湖を 渡りますか？<yesno><close>

trans-unit.resname: <pipipi_npc 12325>「ほほ！ よいぞ ヒトの子。 さあ わらわの背中に 乗るのじゃ！
trans-unit.source: <pipipi_npc 12325>Hoho! Very well, humans. Go on! Get on my back!
trans-unit.target: <pipipi_npc 12325>Hoho! Very well, humans. Go on! Get on my back!

context-group.context: <pipipi_npc 12325>「ほほ！ よいぞ ヒトの子。 さあ わらわの背中に 乗るのじゃ！

trans-unit.resname:
「ティセちゃんは　ずっとトープス君のことを 　心配していたから……あなたたちが一緒に 　捜してくれることになって　よかったわ。
「ぜひ　宿屋のスィーテさんに　話してみて。 　村の恩人である　あなたたちにお礼をしたいって 　言っていたから　大喜びで泊めてくれるはずよ。
trans-unit.source:
Tise has been so worried about Tohpes... I'm really glad that you're helping her search for him.
Please speak with Sueet at the inn. He said he wanted to thank you for saving the village, so I'm sure
he'll be more than happy to let you stay.
trans-unit.target:
Tise has been so worried about Tohpes... I'm really glad that you're helping her search for him.
Please speak with Sueet at the inn. He said he wanted to thank you for saving the village, so I'm sure
he'll be more than happy to let you stay.

context-group.context:
「ティセちゃんは　ずっとトープス君のことを 　心配していたから……あなたたちが一緒に 　捜してくれることになって　よかったわ。
「ぜひ　宿屋のスィーテさんに　話してみて。 　村の恩人である　あなたたちにお礼をしたいって 　言っていたから　大喜びで泊めてくれるはずよ。

trans-unit.resname:
「おおっ！　様！ 　あなた様が　我々を　覚めない眠りから 　救ってくれたと　ロナ長老から　聞いてますよ！
「本当に　あなた様は　命の恩人です！ 　お礼にぜひ　ウチにお泊まりくださいませんか？ 　今回は　無料にさせていただきますから！
「あっ　でも……せっかく　様が 　泊まってくださるなら　さらに念入りに 　お部屋を　準備したいところですね……。
trans-unit.source:
Oh, ! Elder Rona told us that you're the one who saved us from endlessly sleeping!
You truly saved our lives! Would you like to stay here as a token of my appreciation? It'll be free!

「ちょうど　お部屋の準備も終わったみたいだから 　宿屋のスィーテさんに　会いにいってみて。 　きっと　あなたたちのことを　待っているわ。
trans-unit.source:
The Great Cuckoo's mistletoe is pretty mysterious, isn't it? He's been watching over this village for generations.
Looks like he just finished preparing your room, so you you should go see Sueet at the inn. I'm sure he's waiting for you.

trans-unit.source:
Welcome back! Looks like you had no issues being blessed by the Great Cuckoo!
Hehe... How do I know that, you ask? I can see the white fluffs on your head! That's from the mistletoe.
This village has a legend...it says that if white fluffs fly towards you while you pray at the mistletoe, then Cuckoo has taken
a liking to you.
Of course our village's benefactor would receive such a blessing! By the way, your room is ready. Do you want to rest now?

trans-unit.resname:
「吾輩は　暁の使者！ 　偉大なる守護者様より　神殿の門番を任されし 　第一の忠僕なり！
「ここは　メネトの眠りを司る　暁の神殿じゃ。 　まさに　この窮地に　おとずれし珍客は 　女神の希望か　それとも……悪夢の手先か。
「よかろう。吾輩は　自らの役目を　果たすまで！ 　暁の神殿に入りたくば　お前たちが 　メネトにゆかりある者だと　証明してみせよッ！
まれびと　おそらに　まほうをかけた。 たいようのぼって　おひさまさんさん。 くさばな　みんな　よろこんだ。
まれびと　こんどは　コケコケよんだ。 コケコケなくと　みんなは　げんき。 ひのでをいわって　まつりのじゅんび。
まれびと　みんなと　まつりをいわう。 おどりをおどって　たのしいきぶん。 おやまのしんでん　もどってねむる。
コケコケねむれば　たいようしずむ。 つきよになれば　みんなも　ねむる。 ゆめのなかでも　しあわせつづく。 「さあ……宵と暁の伝
trans-unit.source:
I am messenger of dawn, entrusted by the protector as the gatekeeper of this temple, as foremost loyal servant.
This is the Temple of Dawn, that which governs the sleep of Menet. In such dire straits, is our visitor the hope of the Goddess, or...
the agent of a nightmare?
Very well. I shall fulfill my role! If you wish to enter the Temple of Dawn, you must prove of your connection to Menet! The divine being cast a spell over the sky. The sun rises, shining brightly. The grass and flowers all rejoice.
The divine being, now called a kookoo. When the kookoo crows, everyone is happy. Celebrating the sunrise, and preparing the
festival.
The divine being celebrates with us all. Dancing, and feeling much joy. Returning to sleep at the mountain temple.
When the kookoo sleeps, the sun sets. On the moonlit night, all will sleep too. Even in dreams, happiness continues. Now...enter the words of the legend replaced by the "kookoo" using "Nearby" chat! The name of the great being!
trans-unit.target:

「よかろう。吾輩は　自らの役目を　果たすまで！ 　暁の神殿に入りたくば　お前たちが 　メネトにゆかりある者だと　証明してみせよッ！
まれびと　おそらに　まほうをかけた。 たいようのぼって　おひさまさんさん。 くさばな　みんな　よろこんだ。
まれびと　こんどは　コケコケよんだ。 コケコケなくと　みんなは　げんき。 ひのでをいわって　まつりのじゅんび。

コケコケねむれば　たいようしずむ。 つきよになれば　みんなも　ねむる。 ゆめのなかでも　しあわせつづく。 「さあ……宵と暁の伝承の　コケコケに入る 　正しき言葉を！　偉大なる存在の名前を！ 　チャットの『まわりに』で　唱えてみよッ！

trans-unit.resname:
「ねえ　。 　門番の言っている　宵と暁の伝承って 　さっき　君に渡した　あの本に書いてあるよね。
「もう一度　本の内容を読みかえせば 　正解の言葉が　わかるんじゃないかな。

Say, . The name the gatekeeper mentioned is in the Legend of the Dusk and Dawn that I gave you, right?
If you read the book again, maybe you'll find the right answer.

trans-unit.resname:
表紙に　宵と暁の伝承と記された とても古そうな　本だ。 中には　こう記されている。
『まれびと　おそらに　まほうをかけた。 　たいようのぼって　おひさまさんさん。 　くさばな　みんな　よろこんだ。
『まれびと　こんどは　ニワトリよんだ。 　ニワトリなくと　みんなは　げんき。 　ひのでをいわって　まつりのじゅんび。

trans-unit.source:
It's a very old-looking book with the words "The Legend of the Dusk and Dawn" written on the cover. It reads...
"The divine being cast a spell over the sky. The sun rises, shining brightly. The grass and flowers all rejoice."
"The divine being, now called a rooster. When the rooster crows, everyone is happy. Celebrating the sunrise, and preparing the
festival."
The divine being celebrates with us all. Dancing, and feeling much joy. Returning to sleep at the mountain temple.
When the rooster sleeps, the sun sets. On the moonlight night, all will sleep too. Even in dreams, happiness continues.

trans-unit.resname:
「答えはニワトリ！　大正解だッ！　 　メネトにゆかりある者なら　誰しも知っている！ 　ニワトリこそ　メネトの守護神であると！
「それに　お前のその比類なき波動　覚えておる。 　お前の祈りは　メネトのヤドリギより 　吾輩のもとへと　確かに　届いていたからなッ！
「いいだろう……入るがいい！ 　すべては　守護者様の　ご意思のままに！ 　コケッコケッ！！
trans-unit.source:
That is correct! The answer is rooster! Everyone with a connection to Menet knows that the rooster is its protector!
And I remember your unparalleled resonance! Your prayers undoubtedly reached me from the mistletoe of Menet!
Very well... You may enter! All is the will of our protector! Cock-a-doodle-doo!!!

Very well... You may enter! All is the will of our protector! Cock-a-doodle-doo!!!

「答えはニワトリ！　大正解だッ！　 　メネトにゆかりある者なら　誰しも知っている！ 　ニワトリこそ　メネトの守護神であると！
「それに　お前のその比類なき波動　覚えておる。 　お前の祈りは　メネトのヤドリギより 　吾輩のもとへと　確かに　届いていたからなッ！
「いいだろう……入るがいい！ 　すべては　守護者様の　ご意思のままに！ 　コケッコケッ！！

trans-unit.resname:
「うむむ。しかし　ふわふわ飛んでいる体勢では 　羽を休める場所がなく　どうにも落ち着かん。
「これでは　吾輩のチカラを使うのに 　不便極まりないではないか 　どこか止まれる場所は……おや。
trans-unit.source:
Hmm...but when I am flying like this, I cannot rest my wings, making it difficult to relax and focus.
This makes it quite inconvenient for me to use my powers. Is there not somewhere I can just comfortably perch... Oh.

trans-unit.resname:
眠ってしまっている暁の眷属を　起こすには コッケンのトマリギを　装備した見た目に なっている必要があります。
コッケンのトマリギは もし　捨ててしまっても ツボから　何度でも手に入れることができます。
trans-unit.source:
To wake a sleeping Dawn Servant, you must have Cuckoo's Perch equipped.
If you throw it away, you can always get another one from this pot.
trans-unit.target:
To wake a sleeping Dawn Servant, you must have Cuckoo's Perch equipped.

trans-unit.resname:
「コケーーッ！　愚か者め！ 　コッケンのトマリギを　装備した見た目に 　なっておらんではないかッ！
「暁の眷属を　起こさずに進めば　悪夢に 　引きずりこまれると　あれほど言ったのに 　お前ら　三歩　歩いたら忘れる　トリかッ！？
「ちゃんと　コッケンのトマリギを 　装備した見た目になってから　進まんかいッ！
trans-unit.source:
Cluck!!! Fools! You do not have the Perch equipped and its appearance visible!
Did I not tell you that if you proceed without awakening the Dawn Servants first, you'll be dragged into an endless nightmare?
Are you some kind of stupid bird? Did you forget after taking a mere THREE steps forward?!
Make SURE you have the Perch equipped and visible before proceeding forward!

trans-unit.resname:
「よかろう！　これで吾輩も　全力で鳴けるぞ！ 　おっと……言い忘れていたが　吾輩が全力で 　鳴けるのは　３回まで。考えて　進むのだぞ！
「では　ヒトの子よ！ 　いざ　囚われのご主人様のもとへ出発じゃ！
trans-unit.source:
Very good! Now I can crow with all my might! Oops...I forgot to mention! I can only do this three times. Think before proceeding!
Now then, mortal! Let us set off for my captured master!

「あれでは　吾輩のチカラでも起こせぬだろう。 　進めば　闇に飲まれよう。 　別のルートを探すのじゃ！
trans-unit.source:
Hmm...it seems the servant here has collapsed and stopped functioning...
Even my power cannot awaken it in such a state. Going forward would only end in darkness. Let us find another route!

trans-unit.source: It's a statue of Dawnkeeper Cuckoo. It shines a sacred light, so the surrounding area is safe.
trans-unit.target: It's a statue of Dawnkeeper Cuckoo. It shines a sacred light, so the surrounding area is safe.

context-group.context: 暁の使者コッケンを 模した像がある。 聖なる光で 周囲を照らしてくれているので この像の周囲は 安全なようだ。

trans-unit.resname:
「おっ！　見よ！　 　向こうに　２体　並んで見えるのは 　仲良しの暁の眷属どもじゃ。
「あれらは　同色のものと　つながっていての。 　１体　起こせば　この部屋の同色の暁の眷属も 　同時に　起こすことができるのだ。
「ひとつ起こせば　同じヤツらが　全員起きる。 　吾輩のチカラを節約できるということじゃから 　うまく使って　進むのじゃ！
trans-unit.source:
Oh! Look! Two of them are lined up! These servants are friendly!
They are connected to others of the same color. If I awaken one, all of the others in the room with the same color will awaken
as well!
This means I'm able to conserve my power. Use it well and proceed forward!
trans-unit.target:
Oh! Look! Two of them are lined up! These servants are friendly!

trans-unit.resname:
「おおっ！　ありがたい！　天窓じゃぞ！ 　吾輩は　暁の使者なので　天窓からの太陽の光に 　触れると　チカラを戻すことができるのじゃ。
「ただし　一度使ったチカラを　戻すということは 　吾輩のチカラで起こした　この部屋の 　暁の眷属も　また眠ってしまうのじゃ。
「本当に　チカラを戻してしまっていいか 　よく　考えながら　吾輩のチカラを 　うまく使って進むのじゃ！　ヒトの子よ！
trans-unit.source:
Oh! Thank goodness! A skylight! As a messenger of the dawn, I can restore my power if I come into contact with that light.
However! If I restore the power that I have already used, any Dawn Servants I had woken up before will fall back asleep.
Think very carefully about whether it's a good idea or not to restore my power before you do so! Use it well, and proceed forward!
trans-unit.target:

「ここまでくれば　吾輩のチカラを使うことも 　もう　必要ないのでな。どれ　このトマリギは 　吾輩の方で　引き取っておくぞ。
「記念に　欲しくなったら 　神殿の入り口にある　ツボで 　また　拾えるから　よいじゃろう？
trans-unit.source:
Since we've come this far, there is no longer a need for my powers. I shall take this Perch for myself!
If you wish to keep one as a memento, you can get another one from the pot at the entrance! That's fine, yes?
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.resname: ヤドリギ広場への扉だったはずのモノに 不気味なフクロウらしき顔が 浮かんでいる……。
trans-unit.source: What was once the gate to the Mistletoe Plaza now has an eerie, owl-like face located above it...
trans-unit.target: What was once the gate to the Mistletoe Plaza now has an eerie, owl-like face located above it...

context-group.context: ヤドリギ広場への扉だったはずのモノに 不気味なフクロウらしき顔が 浮かんでいる……。

trans-unit.resname:
「ホホウ……？　なんだあ　テメエら？ 　人間どもは　みんな仲良く悪夢の中のはずだ。 　こんな場所に　いるハズねえよな……。
「ホホホッ！　わかったぞ！　お前ら　さては 　ぬし様の手下の中でも　めっちゃ下っ端だろ。 　どうりで　この俺様が　知らないワケだぜ！
「……俺？　俺は　もともと　宵の神殿の 　門番をやってたが　ぬし様の悪夢に魅せられて 　守護天使を裏切った　極悪非道のフクロウさ。
「ぬし様は　ただいま　お取込み中なんで　 　雑魚どもに　かまけてる場合じゃねえんだよ。 　さっさと　帰んな！　シッシッ！
trans-unit.source:
Hoo hoo...? And just hoo are you? All humans should be happily trapped within their nightmares! So, how are you here...?
Hoohoo! I get it! You all must be the lowest of the low amongst the master's minions! No wonder someone as great as ME
would have noticed you!
...Hoo, me? I used to be the gatekeeper of the Temple of Twilight, but I was just SO captivated by the master's nightmare,
that I betrayed the Guardian Angel! An utterly ruthless owl, I am.
The master is currently busy, so he has no time to deal with small fry such as yourselves. Go on! Shoo! Shoo!
trans-unit.target:
Hoo hoo...? And just hoo are you? All humans should be happily trapped within their nightmares! So, how are you here...?

would have noticed you!

that I betrayed the Guardian Angel! An utterly ruthless owl, I am.

trans-unit.resname:
「ホホーー？　大事な用があるから　通せって？ 　ならお前が　ぬし様に会わせる価値があるって 　俺様に　証明してもらおうじゃねえか。
「ここにいる　哀れなメネトの住人どもは 　ぬし様特製の悪夢を　お楽しみ中だ！　 　お前は　それが何の動物の悪夢か　わかるか？
「お……俺様は　知ってるぜ？　当たり前だろ！ 　さあ　メネトの村人を苦しめている動物の名を 　チャットの『まわりに』で　言ってみろ！
trans-unit.source:
Hoo hoo? You want me to let you through because you say you have important business? Then you'll have to prove your worthiness!
These poor, poor people of Menet are witnessing a nightmare crafted just for them! Do you know which animal is in this nightmare?
O...of course I know! Obviously! Now, say the name of the animal that is tormenting everyone in "Nearby" chat!

「耳をふさいでいても　カリカリカリカリ……って 　ヤツらのかじる音が　聞こえる気がするんだ。 　ほら！　今も　すぐ近くから　聞こえるぞ！　
「ククッ……もしかしたら　あいつが 　俺の頭の中に入って　脳みそをかじってる音が 　聞こえているのかもしれないな……クククッ。

「ホホー！　ネズミ！　そうか　なるほどなぁ。 　いや～　スッキリしたぜ！　
「って……も　もちろん俺様は　最初っから 　知ってたけどなぁ！　俺様は優しいから 　お前に合わせて　納得したフリしてやったんだ！
「まったく　ネズミなんてショボいヤツを 　恐ろしい悪夢に　変えちまうなんて 　ぬし様は　やっぱ　すげえんだなぁ～！
「お前も　結構やるじゃねえか！ 　雑魚じゃないってわかったことだし 　それじゃ　通っていいぜ！
trans-unit.source:
Hoo hoo! Mice! I see! That all makes sense now. Ah, I feel so much better!
Er...of course, I knew that already! I just pretended to agree with you because I'm so kind!
Turning such insignificant creatures like mice into terrifying nightmares... The master truly is incredible!
You did quite well yourself! Now that I know you're not so insignificant, you may pass!

A weathered stone monument stands tall on a pedestal. What appear to be letters are engraved on its surface, but they
were completely unreadable...

trans-unit.resname:
「はじめまして！　ボクは　プクフル。 　キミたちの世界が生まれる　ずっとずっと昔から 　ここ　誓約の園で　暮らしてるんだよ。
「グランゼニスも　ルティアナも　ゼネシアも 　みんなみんな　ボクのともだちさ。 　……さあ　空を飛んで　上へ向かって。
「何万年も前から　キミたちが来てくれるのを 　待ってる子が　いるんだ。 　元気な顔を　見せてあげてね。
trans-unit.source:
Nice to meet you! I'm Pukuful. I've been living here in the Grounds of the Covenant, long before your world
was born.
Gran Zenith, Lutiana, Zenethia, even everyone... They're my friends. Go on, fly into the sky and head upwards.
There's someone who's been waiting for you to come for tens of thousands of years. Show them your cheerful face, okay?
trans-unit.target:
Nice to meet you! I'm Pukuful. I've been living here in the Grounds of the Covenant, long before your world
was born.
Gran Zenith, Lutiana, Zenethia, even everyone... They're my friends. Go on, fly into the sky and head upwards.
There's someone who's been waiting for you to come for tens of thousands of years. Show them your cheerful face, okay?

「さあ　空を飛んで　上へ向かって。 　何万年も前から　キミたちが来てくれるのを 　待ってる子に　元気な顔を　見せてあげてね。
trans-unit.source:
My name's Pukuful. This place is the Grounds of the Covenant. All of Zeniath's children are my friends.
Go on, fly into the sky and head upwards. There's someone who's been waiting for you to come for tens of thousands of years.
Show them your cheerful face, okay?
trans-unit.target:
My name's Pukuful. This place is the Grounds of the Covenant. All of Zeniath's children are my friends.
Go on, fly into the sky and head upwards. There's someone who's been waiting for you to come for tens of thousands of years.

context-group.context:
「ボクの名前は　プクフル。ずっとずっと昔から 　ここ　誓約の園で　暮らしてるんだ。 　ゼニアスの子は　みんな　ボクのともだちさ。
「さあ　空を飛んで　上へ向かって。 　何万年も前から　キミたちが来てくれるのを 　待ってる子に　元気な顔を　見せてあげてね。

trans-unit.resname:
いずれ訪れるであろう　ルティアナの末裔 誓約の子のため 我　主神グランゼニスは　これを遺す
主神グランゼニスのチカラを　宿せし 継承の証たる　神器は２つ 主神の王冠と　主神の王笏
主神の王冠は　創生のチカラ 主神の王笏は　破壊のチカラを宿す どちらが欠けても　主神の継承はかなわぬ
我が娘　女神ゼネシアと　女神ルティアナよ 汝らに　２つの神器を遺す　互いに助けあい ゼニアスの新たなる主神と　なるがよい
trans-unit.source:
To Lutiana's descendants who shall one day come; for the Children of the Covenant, I, Gran Zenith, leave these words.
There are two divine artifacts that signify the inheritance of my power: the Scepter of the Almighty and the Crown of the Almighty.
The Crown holds the power of creation, while the Scepter holds the power of destruction. Without both, succession
is not possible.
To my daughters, Zenethia and Lutiana, I leave these two divine artifacts. Help one another, and become the new Almighty
of Zeniath.
trans-unit.target:
To Lutiana's descendants who shall one day come; for the Children of the Covenant, I, Gran Zenith, leave these words.
There are two divine artifacts that signify the inheritance of my power: the Scepter of the Almighty and the Crown of the Almighty.
The Crown holds the power of creation, while the Scepter holds the power of destruction. Without both, succession
is not possible.
To my daughters, Zenethia and Lutiana, I leave these two divine artifacts. Help one another, and become the new Almighty
of Zeniath.

context-group.context:
いずれ訪れるであろう　ルティアナの末裔 誓約の子のため 我　主神グランゼニスは　これを遺す

trans-unit.resname:
いずれ訪れるであろう　ルティアナの末裔 誓約の子のため 我　主神グランゼニスは　これを遺す
とこしえのゆりかご　ゼニアスを創りしは 我　主神グランゼニスのチカラなり されど　主神とて　永遠にあらず
この世界を　とこしえのものと　するためには 新たなる神に　主神の座を継承し 世界を　守り続けねばならぬ
侵略者ジア・クトによりて　傷つけられたる ゼニアスを　よみがえらせることができるのは 新たなる主神のみなのだ
trans-unit.source:
To Lutiana's descendants who shall one day come; for the Children of the Covenant, I, Gran Zenith, leave these words.
The creation of the Eternal Cradle, Zeniath, was by my power as Almighty. However, even this power is not eternal.
To make this world everlasting, a new god must inherit the seat of the Almighty and continue to protect this world.
Only a new Almighty may revive Zeniath, the land that has been damaged by our invaders, the Dia Kut.
trans-unit.target:
To Lutiana's descendants who shall one day come; for the Children of the Covenant, I, Gran Zenith, leave these words.

Only a new Almighty may revive Zeniath, the land that has been damaged by our invaders, the Dia Kut.

もしも　そなたが　誓約の園を訪れし時 主神たる我が　滅び去っていたならば 迷わず　主神を継承せよ
２つの神器にて　新たなる主神となり その　創生のチカラにて ゼニアスの未来を　創造するのだ
trans-unit.source:
To Lutiana's descendants who shall one day come; for the Children of the Covenant, I, Gran Zenith, leave these words.
If you visit the Grounds and I have perished, do not hesitate to inherit the title of Almighty.
With the two divine artifacts, become the new Almighty, and with that power of creation, forge the future of Zeniath.
trans-unit.target:

「ここに置いてある　人形……。 　町のヒトたちに　似てますねぇ……。
「でも　なんだか　造りが粗いと言いますか……。 　エドアルド様が　作ったものではないように 　思います。
「これ……もしかして 　ルーミリア様が　作ったものでしょうか？
trans-unit.source:
The dolls here... They resemble the people from town...
However, they're not very well made... I don't think Eduardo made them.
Maybe...Lumeria was the one who did?

trans-unit.resname: <pipipi_npc 12386><icon_exc_npc 12503>「どうしたんでしょう……？ なんだか へん……。
trans-unit.source: <pipipi_npc 12386><icon_exc_npc 12503>What happened...? Something feels strange...
trans-unit.target: <pipipi_npc 12386><icon_exc_npc 12503>What happened...? Something feels strange...

trans-unit.resname:
「……あれ？ 　今の　なんでしょう……。
「なんだか　身体が　熱くなったような？ 　人形なのに　おかしいですよねぇ。
trans-unit.source:
Huh...? What was...?
I feels like my body is getting warmer... But that is strange for a doll...
trans-unit.target:
Huh...? What was...?
I feels like my body is getting warmer... But that is strange for a doll...

context-group.context:
「……あれ？ 　今の　なんでしょう……。
「なんだか　身体が　熱くなったような？ 　人形なのに　おかしいですよねぇ。

trans-unit.resname:
「どうして……記憶は修繕したじゃないですかっ！ 　ムニエカの町の……大切な記憶……。 　私の　大切な人たち……。
「私たちは　町のみんなを　救うため 　先に進まなければ　ならないんですぅ……。 　お願いですから　ここを　通してっ！
trans-unit.source:
Why...why weren't the memories repaired?! Munieka's...precious memories... My precious people's...
We have to go ahead to save everyone... So, please! Let us pass!
trans-unit.target:
Why...why weren't the memories repaired?! Munieka's...precious memories... My precious people's...

「どうして……記憶は修繕したじゃないですかっ！ 　ムニエカの町の……大切な記憶……。 　私の　大切な人たち……。

trans-unit.resname:
「わ……これで　先に進めますねぇ……。 　よかったぁ……。
「でも　どうして　いきなり……？ 　様が　スイッチを押したときには 　動かなかったのに……。
trans-unit.source:
Ah... We can keep going... Thank goodness...
But, what happened so suddenly...? Nothing happened when you pressed the switch...
trans-unit.target:
Ah... We can keep going... Thank goodness...

「わ……これで　先に進めますねぇ……。 　よかったぁ……。

trans-unit.resname: <pipipi_npc 12386>「……ムニエカのみんなは 悪くありません。 悪いのは 全部……。
trans-unit.source: <pipipi_npc 12386>The people of Munieka aren't to blame... Everything is because of...
trans-unit.target: <pipipi_npc 12386>The people of Munieka aren't to blame... Everything is because of...

context-group.context: <pipipi_npc 12386>「……ムニエカのみんなは 悪くありません。 悪いのは 全部……。

trans-unit.resname: <pipipi_npc 12386>「……また 身体が熱くなった。 これは いったい……。
trans-unit.source: <pipipi_npc 12386>My body feels hot again... What is going on...?
trans-unit.target: <pipipi_npc 12386>My body feels hot again... What is going on...?

trans-unit.resname:
「あ……様。 　すみません　ぼーっとしちゃって……。
「記憶を見てから　ドロテア　おかしいんです。 　ルーミリア様のことを考えると　胸が騒いで 　自分が　自分でなくなるような気して……。
「こんなんじゃ　いけませんよね。 　大好きなご主人様の　望みなんですもの。 　しっかりしなくちゃ……。
trans-unit.source:
Ah...... I'm sorry for spacing out...
Mudara has been acting strange since she saw those memories. When she thinks of Lumeria, her heart starts beating fast and
she doesn't feel like herself anymore...
This won't do... It is what my beloved Master wants. Just keep it together...
trans-unit.target:

「……やっぱり　私の声に　反応してる。 　記憶を……修繕したから……。
「私は……ドロテアは……。

I am... Mudara is...
