trans-unit.resname: 帝国の闇サンタたちは 三将軍の手紙と プレゼントリストを 落としていった。 <auto_br=5000> <pnplacehold>は 三将軍の手紙（だいじなもの）と プレゼントリスト（だいじなもの）を 手に入れた！ 聖天の使いに 報告しよう。<me 60><auto_bw=5000><close>
trans-unit.source: The Yuleish Empire relinquish the Letter from the Generals and the Present List. <auto_br=5000> <pnplacehold> takes both of them! Go and report this to the Holy Messenger!<me 60><auto_bw=5000><close>
trans-unit.target: The Yuleish Empire relinquish the Letter from the Generals and the Present List. <auto_br=5000> <pnplacehold> takes both of them! Go and report this to the Holy Messenger!<me 60><auto_bw=5000><close>

context-group.context: 帝国の闇サンタたちは 三将軍の手紙と プレゼントリストを 落としていった。 <auto_br=5000> <pnplacehold>は 三将軍の手紙（だいじなもの）と プレゼントリスト（だいじなもの）を 手に入れた！ 聖天の使いに 報告しよう。<me 60><auto_bw=5000><close>

trans-unit.resname:
「どれどれ……こりゃ　超古代の文字だな。 　とりあえず　読んでみるぜ。
「……我々　ガナン帝国の三将軍が扮する 　闇の使者は　アストルティアの者たちが扮する 　光の使者によって　倒された。
「ゆえに　ガナン式クリスマスの　掟に従い 　プレゼントリストを返し　この地を覆う闇も 　晴らすものとしよう。
「今後も　聖夜の大広間にて　光の使者の 　挑戦を待つ。我々　闇の使者を　打ち倒し 　プレゼントを　手に入れるがよい。
「……こいつは　大物からの手紙だが 　好き勝手しやがって　まったく 　しょうもねえ連中だぜ……。
「だが　たとえ　こんなヤツらでも 　１年に　１度だけ　歩み寄る日があってもいい。
「……そう思わねえか　。 　今度は　こっちのクリスマスを 　あいつらに　堪能してもらおうじゃねえか！
trans-unit.source:
Let's see here...the writing's pretty old. I'll give it a read.
"We, the Triumgorate of the Gittish Empire, disguised as harbingers of darkness, were defeated by messengers of light, played in
part by the people of Astoltia.
Therefore, in accordance with Gittish Christmas custom, we shall return your present list and dispel this darkness.
We shall continue to await the challenge of other messengers of light within the Holy Grand Hall. Defeat us, and you
may claim presents as your reward."
Sheesh...talk about big shots. They really just do whatever they feel like, eh? What a ridiculous lot!
Still, even for them...it doesn't hurt to have just one day of compromise a year.
You think so too, right ? Alright, then! Let's give 'em a taste of our own Christmas!
trans-unit.target:
Let's see here...the writing's pretty old. I'll give it a read.
"We, the Triumgorate of the Gittish Empire, disguised as harbingers of darkness, were defeated by messengers of light, played in
part by the people of Astoltia.
Therefore, in accordance with Gittish Christmas custom, we shall return your present list and dispel this darkness.
We shall continue to await the challenge of other messengers of light within the Holy Grand Hall. Defeat us, and you
may claim presents as your reward."
Sheesh...talk about big shots. They really just do whatever they feel like, eh? What a ridiculous lot!
Still, even for them...it doesn't hurt to have just one day of compromise a year.
You think so too, right ? Alright, then! Let's give 'em a taste of our own Christmas!

context-group.context:
「どれどれ……こりゃ　超古代の文字だな。 　とりあえず　読んでみるぜ。
「……我々　ガナン帝国の三将軍が扮する 　闇の使者は　アストルティアの者たちが扮する 　光の使者によって　倒された。
「ゆえに　ガナン式クリスマスの　掟に従い 　プレゼントリストを返し　この地を覆う闇も 　晴らすものとしよう。
「今後も　聖夜の大広間にて　光の使者の 　挑戦を待つ。我々　闇の使者を　打ち倒し 　プレゼントを　手に入れるがよい。
「……こいつは　大物からの手紙だが 　好き勝手しやがって　まったく 　しょうもねえ連中だぜ……。
「だが　たとえ　こんなヤツらでも 　１年に　１度だけ　歩み寄る日があってもいい。
「……そう思わねえか　。 　今度は　こっちのクリスマスを 　あいつらに　堪能してもらおうじゃねえか！

trans-unit.resname: どこからともなく 声が聞こえてきた。
trans-unit.source: A voice echoes from afar.
trans-unit.target: A voice echoes from afar.

context-group.context: どこからともなく 声が聞こえてきた。

trans-unit.resname: この旅の扉から 聖夜の大広間と呼ばれる場所へ 行くことができます。中に入ると 専用の衣装を着て 戦うことになります。<bw_break>
trans-unit.source: This teleport will take you to a place called the Holy Grand Hall. Once inside, you will do battle donning a special costume.
trans-unit.target: This teleport will take you to a place called the Holy Grand Hall. Once inside, you will do battle donning a special costume.

trans-unit.resname: <center>アストルティアの者たちよ。おまえたちは 我が国のクリスマスに従い 光の使者となって 闇の使者である 我々を 倒さねばならない。<bw_break>
trans-unit.source: People of Astoltia! You must follow our Christmas custom and become messengers of light to defeat us, harbingers of darkness!<bw_break>
trans-unit.target: People of Astoltia! You must follow our Christmas custom and become messengers of light to defeat us, harbingers of darkness!<bw_break>

trans-unit.resname: 「貴様……なかなか やるな。 我が国に帰還した暁には 貴様を見習うよう 国の連中を ギッタギタに 鍛えてやろう！
trans-unit.source: Blasted...you're quite good. When I return to my empire, I will be sure to teach my people your ways of combat!
trans-unit.target: Blasted...you're quite good. When I return to my empire, I will be sure to teach my people your ways of combat!

context-group.context: 「貴様……なかなか やるな。 我が国に帰還した暁には 貴様を見習うよう 国の連中を ギッタギタに 鍛えてやろう！

trans-unit.resname: 「ようやく 我々が扮する 闇の使者から プレゼントを取り戻すことが できるほどの ツワモノに 出会えたな。
trans-unit.source: Finally...we were able to find someone capable of defeating us while we were disguised as harbingers of darkness.
trans-unit.target: Finally...we were able to find someone capable of defeating us while we were disguised as harbingers of darkness.

context-group.context: 「ようやく 我々が扮する 闇の使者から プレゼントを取り戻すことが できるほどの ツワモノに 出会えたな。

trans-unit.resname: 「光の使者としての あなたの戦いぶり 見事でした。我が国でも 我々を 倒すことのできる者は そうはいませんよ。
trans-unit.source: You did splendidly as a messenger of light. There exist few in our country who can best us, you know.
trans-unit.target: You did splendidly as a messenger of light. There exist few in our country who can best us, you know.

context-group.context: 「光の使者としての あなたの戦いぶり 見事でした。我が国でも 我々を 倒すことのできる者は そうはいませんよ。

trans-unit.resname:
「お前さんの　がんばりのおかげで 　子供たちの願いを　かなえられそうだ。 　……こりゃ　お前さんにも奇跡が起こるかもな。
「そういや　三将軍のギュメイとかいう奴が 　お前さんに　話があるみたいだぜ。 　行ってやったら　どうだ？
trans-unit.source:
Thanks for all yer help! Looks like the kids' wishes'll come true after all. Maybe you'll get some kinda miracle yourself!
Oh, that's right. One of those guys, the one named PurvissーI think he wanted to see ya. Why not go and talk to 'im?
trans-unit.target:
Thanks for all yer help! Looks like the kids' wishes'll come true after all. Maybe you'll get some kinda miracle yourself!
Oh, that's right. One of those guys, the one named PurvissーI think he wanted to see ya. Why not go and talk to 'im?

context-group.context:
「お前さんの　がんばりのおかげで 　子供たちの願いを　かなえられそうだ。 　……こりゃ　お前さんにも奇跡が起こるかもな。
「そういや　三将軍のギュメイとかいう奴が 　お前さんに　話があるみたいだぜ。 　行ってやったら　どうだ？

trans-unit.resname:
「ワッハッハッハ！　のおかげで 　帝国の三将軍まで　来ちまって 　カオスな　星夜祭になったな！
「……まあ　祭りだしな。 　ちょっとくらい　ハメを外したっていいだろう！ 　これは　楽しい気分にさせてくれた礼だ。
trans-unit.source:
Wahaha! Thanks to you, even the Triumgorate showed up here! This has been quite the chaotic Starry Night Festival, yeah?!
Well, it IS a festival, after all... Everyone should just cut loose! Consider this as my thanks for lightening the mood!
trans-unit.target:
Wahaha! Thanks to you, even the Triumgorate showed up here! This has been quite the chaotic Starry Night Festival, yeah?!
Well, it IS a festival, after all... Everyone should just cut loose! Consider this as my thanks for lightening the mood!

trans-unit.source: The Holy Messenger takes the letter from <pnplacehold>.
trans-unit.target: The Holy Messenger takes the letter from <pnplacehold>.

context-group.context: 聖天の使いは <pnplacehold>から 三将軍の手紙を 取り上げた。

trans-unit.resname: 「でかしたぜ <pnplacehold>！ ……ん？ お前さんが手に持ってる その手紙みたいなのは なんだ？
trans-unit.source: Nice work there, <pnplacehold>! ...Say, what's that you have there in your hand?
trans-unit.target: Nice work there, <pnplacehold>! ...Say, what's that you have there in your hand?

context-group.context: 「でかしたぜ <pnplacehold>！ ……ん？ お前さんが手に持ってる その手紙みたいなのは なんだ？

trans-unit.resname: <pnplacehold>は 聖天の使いに プレゼントリストを渡した！

trans-unit.target: <pnplacehold> hands the Present List over to the Holy Messenger!

context-group.context: <pnplacehold>は 聖天の使いに プレゼントリストを渡した！

trans-unit.resname: 聖天の使いに プレゼントリストを 渡しますか？<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>
trans-unit.source: Give the Present List to the Holy Messenger?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>
trans-unit.target: Give the Present List to the Holy Messenger?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

context-group.context: 聖天の使いに プレゼントリストを 渡しますか？<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

trans-unit.resname: 「おっ <pnplacehold> 戻ってきたな。 広場の闇が 急に晴れたんだが プレゼントリストは 取り戻せたか？
trans-unit.source: Oh, you're back! The darkness is all gone now. Did you get the present list back?
trans-unit.target: Oh, you're back! The darkness is all gone now. Did you get the present list back?

context-group.context: 「おっ <pnplacehold> 戻ってきたな。 広場の闇が 急に晴れたんだが プレゼントリストは 取り戻せたか？

trans-unit.resname:
「この世界には　おまえのようなツワモノも 　存在しているのだな。 　おまえに　出会えたことを　うれしく思うぞ。
「手紙で　伝えたとおり 　引き続き　聖夜の大広間では 　闇の使者に扮する　我々と　戦うことができる。
「我々に勝利すれば　帝国のプレゼント券が 　手に入るぞ。私に持ってくれば　好きなものと 　交換してやろう。では　さっそく……
trans-unit.source:
So, formidable warriors such as yourself really do exist in this world... I am pleased to have met you.
As mentioned in the letter, you may continue to do combat with us in the Holy Grand Hall if you wish.
Defeating us will earn you Empire Present Tickets. You may bring them to me to exchange for whatever you like. Now, then...
trans-unit.target:
So, formidable warriors such as yourself really do exist in this world... I am pleased to have met you.
As mentioned in the letter, you may continue to do combat with us in the Holy Grand Hall if you wish.
Defeating us will earn you Empire Present Tickets. You may bring them to me to exchange for whatever you like. Now, then...

context-group.context:
「この世界には　おまえのようなツワモノも 　存在しているのだな。 　おまえに　出会えたことを　うれしく思うぞ。
「手紙で　伝えたとおり 　引き続き　聖夜の大広間では 　闇の使者に扮する　我々と　戦うことができる。
「我々に勝利すれば　帝国のプレゼント券が 　手に入るぞ。私に持ってくれば　好きなものと 　交換してやろう。では　さっそく……

trans-unit.resname:
「ようやく　我々が扮する　闇の使者から 　プレゼントを取り戻すことが　できるほどの 　ツワモノに　出会えたな。
「星の大樹広場に戻り　私に 　帝国のプレゼント券を　渡してくれれば 　プレゼントと　交換してやろう。
trans-unit.source:
Finally...we were able to find someone capable of defeating us while we were disguised as harbingers of darkness.
Return to the Starry Tree Plaza with those Empire Tickets in hand, and I will exchange them for various presents.
trans-unit.target:
Finally...we were able to find someone capable of defeating us while we were disguised as harbingers of darkness.
Return to the Starry Tree Plaza with those Empire Tickets in hand, and I will exchange them for various presents.

context-group.context:

「星の大樹広場に戻り　私に 　帝国のプレゼント券を　渡してくれれば 　プレゼントと　交換してやろう。

trans-unit.resname:
『不死の魔王と十二将』という本だ。
不死の魔王ネロドスは　歴代の大魔王の中でも 多くの配下を抱えていることで　知られ その側近集団は　魔軍十二将と呼ばれている。
十二将は　互いを　はげしくライバル視しており 事あるごとに　功を競い　主君の歓心を 買うことに　執心していたという。
竜将ドラゴンガイアは　多くの敵を滅ぼし 最強の十二将と呼ばれることを　誇りとした。
早くからネロドスに臣従した　獄将ベリアルは 最古の十二将を名乗り　暴将黒竜丸は その進攻速度から　最速の十二将と称された。
邪将トロルバッコスは　完璧に侍従の役をこなし 最良の十二将と呼ばれ　楽将バトルシェイカは 主君を楽しませ　最愛の十二将の名を冠した。
ネロドス自身のカリスマ性も　さりながら 彼が　臣下に与える　不死のチカラという報酬が 十二将の競争心を　駆り立てたのだと思われる。
trans-unit.source:
It's a book titled "The Immortal Demon Lord and the Twelve Tyrants".
Nerodos, the Immortal Demon Lord, was known among the Demon Lords of the past for commanding an exceptionally large number of
subordinates. His elite group was known as "The Twelve Tyrants".
The Twelve were fiercely competitive amongst each other, hoping that their achievements would win their master's favor.
Tyrant Gaia Dragon took pride in being called the strongest of the Twelve, having destroyed countless enemies.
Tyrant Belial, who pledged his loyalty to Nerodos very early on, claimed the title of the oldest of the Twelve.
Tyrant Equinox was known as the fastest of the Twelve, due to his attacks of unmatched speed.
Tyrant Gladiator Troll excelled in his duties as an attendant, and earned the title of the most reliable of the Twelve.
Tyrant Maracaraider was quite entertaining to his master, and earned the title of the most beloved of the Twelve.
Nerodos' charisma undoubtedly played a role in their strong loyalty, but it is believed that the gift of immortality he could grant is
what fueled the Twelve's intense rivalry.
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.resname:
「お帰りなさい　さん！
「ポルテさんは　すっかり　村になじんでますよ。 　ラキさんも　少しずつ　村の人たちと 　関わるようになってきています。
「そう言えば　ポルテさんが 　さんに　用があるとか。南東にある 　ポルテさんたちの家に　行ってあげてください！
trans-unit.source:
Welcome back, !
Porte is completely settled here now, and Lycae is becoming more familiar with the villagers.
Speaking of which, Porte said she needed you for something. Please go to her house and see what she wants!
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.resname:
「主神の王冠を見つけて　ちいねえさまの子 　グランゼニス神を　ゼニアスに連れていけば…… 　新たな主神が　誕生する。
「ゼニアスは　救われる。ねえさまと…… 　亡き　とうさまも　よろこぶ。 　だけど　ラキは……。
「……なんでもない。 　ラキも　早く　ゼニアスを救いたい。 　それだけ……。
trans-unit.source:
If we find the Crown of the Almighty and bring Gran Zenith to Zeniath, then a new Almighty will be born...
Zeniath will be saved. Sister will be happy... And Father, too. But, Lycae...
...It's nothing. Lycae just wants to save Zeniath as quickly as he can. That's all...
trans-unit.target:
If we find the Crown of the Almighty and bring Gran Zenith to Zeniath, then a new Almighty will be born...
Zeniath will be saved. Sister will be happy... And Father, too. But, Lycae...
...It's nothing. Lycae just wants to save Zeniath as quickly as he can. That's all...

trans-unit.resname: 「<pnplacehold>！ これからの話をしたいけど…… 目的地が決まったら しばらく この家には 戻ってこれないかも。大丈夫かな？<yesno 2><break>
trans-unit.source:
! I'd like to talk to you about what's next...
But once we decide where we're gonna go, we might not be able to come back here for awhile. Is that fine?
trans-unit.target:
! I'd like to talk to you about what's next...

context-group.context: 「<pnplacehold>！ これからの話をしたいけど…… 目的地が決まったら しばらく この家には 戻ってこれないかも。大丈夫かな？<yesno 2><break>

trans-unit.resname: 「おっけー！ 準備が できたら また あたしに話しかけてね。
trans-unit.source: O-kay! Talk me again whenever you're ready!
trans-unit.target: O-kay! Talk me again whenever you're ready!

context-group.context: 「おっけー！ 準備が できたら また あたしに話しかけてね。

trans-unit.resname:
「おっけー！　じゃあ　まずは 　今までのことを　整理しておこっか。
「えっと……ジア・クトの侵略と　それに対抗して 　主神グランゼニスさまが放った　創失の呪いで 　ゼニアスは　ボロボロの状態なんだよね。
「ゼニアスを蘇らせるには 　主神グランゼニス……パパゼニスさまに代わる 　新しい主神が　必要なの。
「新しい主神になってもらうのは 　女神ルティアナさまの末っ子で　人間の種族神の 　グランゼニス……まごゼニスさま。
「でも　まごゼニスさまが　主神を継承するには 　ふたつの神具が　必要なんだったね。
「そのうち　主神の王笏は 　ネーしゃまが持ってるけど　主神の王冠は 　どこにあるか　わかんないまま。
「しかも　苦労して復活させた　まごゼニスさまは 　やることがある！　とか言って 　どっか　行っちゃった……。
「……おさらいは　こんなとこかな？
trans-unit.source:
O-kay! First, let's summarize what's happened so far.
Um...so Zeniath is in shambles because of the Dia Kut and the curse of unmaking that Gran Zenith unleashed in response.
To help Zeniath, we need a new Almighty to replace Gran Zenith...er, Papa Zenith.
And the new Almighty is supposed to be Lutiana's son, the human god Gran Zenith... er, Gran-son Zenith.
But Gran-son Zenith needs the two divine artifacts to do that.
Zenny has the Scepter, but we have no clue where the Crown is.
And right after we worked so hard to revive him, Gran-son Zenith just runs off, saying he has something to do...
...I guess that's everything so far.
trans-unit.target:
O-kay! First, let's summarize what's happened so far.
Um...so Zeniath is in shambles because of the Dia Kut and the curse of unmaking that Gran Zenith unleashed in response.

Zenny has the Scepter, but we have no clue where the Crown is.
And right after we worked so hard to revive him, Gran-son Zenith just runs off, saying he has something to do...
...I guess that's everything so far.

「よくぞ　いらっしゃいました 　様。
「さあ　アンルシア様の部屋へ……。 　そこに　お捜しの方が　いらっしゃいます。

trans-unit.resname:
「さあ　。 　主神の王冠を　手に入れるため 　グランゼニスさまの試練に　挑みましょう！
「この部屋にある　緋石をしらべると 　試練場に　行けるわ。
「グランゼニスさまに　勇者と大魔王の…… 　私たちの　調和の精神を 　見せてさしあげましょう！
trans-unit.source:
Come on, . Let's take on Gran Zenith's trial to get the Crown of the Almighty!
We can enter the trial grounds by checking the Crimsonite over there.
Let's show him the spirit of harmony between the Hero and the Demon Lord!
trans-unit.target:
Come on, . Let's take on Gran Zenith's trial to get the Crown of the Almighty!
We can enter the trial grounds by checking the Crimsonite over there.
Let's show him the spirit of harmony between the Hero and the Demon Lord!

context-group.context:
「さあ　。 　主神の王冠を　手に入れるため 　グランゼニスさまの試練に　挑みましょう！
「この部屋にある　緋石をしらべると 　試練場に　行けるわ。
「グランゼニスさまに　勇者と大魔王の…… 　私たちの　調和の精神を 　見せてさしあげましょう！

trans-unit.resname:
この緋石から　勇者姫アンルシアとともに グランゼニスの試練場に　進めます。
勇者姫アンルシアの　戦いの準備は 王家の迷宮へ　つながる 光の扉のメニューから　おこなってください。
このまま　グランゼニスの試練場へ進みますか？
trans-unit.source:
Using this Crimsonite, you can proceed to Gran Zenith's trial together with Anlucia.
Be sure to prepare Anlucia for battle by using the menu after examining the Door of Light.
Proceed to the Trial of Gran Zenith?
trans-unit.target:
Using this Crimsonite, you can proceed to Gran Zenith's trial together with Anlucia.
Be sure to prepare Anlucia for battle by using the menu after examining the Door of Light.
Proceed to the Trial of Gran Zenith?

context-group.context:
この緋石から　勇者姫アンルシアとともに グランゼニスの試練場に　進めます。
勇者姫アンルシアの　戦いの準備は 王家の迷宮へ　つながる 光の扉のメニューから　おこなってください。
このまま　グランゼニスの試練場へ進みますか？

trans-unit.resname:
「おつかれさま　！ 　今の魔物からは　グランゼニスさまの…… 　神のチカラを　感じたの。
「魔物と戦うことも　試練の一部なのだろうけど 　あなたと一緒だもの　負ける気がしないわ！
「とは言え　油断は大敵。 　気を引きしめて　進みましょうね。
trans-unit.source:
Nice work, ! I felt Gran Zenith's divine power from that monster just now...
Fighting them is likely part of the trial, but I know I can't lose with you by my side!
However, carelessness will only hamper us. Let's keep our guard up and press on!
trans-unit.target:
Nice work, ! I felt Gran Zenith's divine power from that monster just now...
Fighting them is likely part of the trial, but I know I can't lose with you by my side!
However, carelessness will only hamper us. Let's keep our guard up and press on!

context-group.context:
「おつかれさま　！ 　今の魔物からは　グランゼニスさまの…… 　神のチカラを　感じたの。
「魔物と戦うことも　試練の一部なのだろうけど 　あなたと一緒だもの　負ける気がしないわ！
「とは言え　油断は大敵。 　気を引きしめて　進みましょうね。

trans-unit.resname:
神話時代の終焉　第一章 ー　ナドラガ神との戦い　ー
眠れる主　グランゼニス神に代わり 神獣ファルシオン　ここに記す。
女神ルティアナが　光の河と化した後 竜族が他種を統べるべきと主張する　ナドラガ神と 弟妹である六神との間で　争いが起きた。
肉体を失った　種族神たちが　最後のチカラを 断罪の剣へと与えることで　ついに ナドラガ神を打ち倒すことに　成功したのだ。
しかし　勝利した　グランゼニス神もまた チカラを使い果たし　回復のため 永き眠りを　必要とされることになった。
眠りにつく前に　我が主 人間の神　グランゼニスは 神を失う世界のため　いくつかの手を打たれた。
始まりの大魔王　ゴダとの会談も そのひとつである。
trans-unit.source:
The End of the Mythical Age, Chapter One The Battle with Nadraga
In place of Gran Zenith, the slumbering god, I, divine beast Falchion, shall record these words here.
After Lutiana became the River of Light, a conflict arose between Nadraga, god of the Nadravians, and his six younger siblings.
He claimed that the Nadravians had the right to rule over all other races.
The race gods, having lost their physical forms, poured their remaining strength into the Sword of Atonement. At last, they were
able to defeat the wicked Nadraga.
Although victorious, Gran Zenith also used much of His strength and required a long slumber to recover.
Before falling asleep, He took several measures to ensure the safety of a world without gods.
One such measure was meeting with Goda, the first Demon Lord.
trans-unit.target:
The End of the Mythical Age, Chapter One The Battle with Nadraga
In place of Gran Zenith, the slumbering god, I, divine beast Falchion, shall record these words here.
After Lutiana became the River of Light, a conflict arose between Nadraga, god of the Nadravians, and his six younger siblings.
He claimed that the Nadravians had the right to rule over all other races.
The race gods, having lost their physical forms, poured their remaining strength into the Sword of Atonement. At last, they were
able to defeat the wicked Nadraga.
Although victorious, Gran Zenith also used much of His strength and required a long slumber to recover.
Before falling asleep, He took several measures to ensure the safety of a world without gods.
One such measure was meeting with Goda, the first Demon Lord.

眠れる主　グランゼニス神に代わり 神獣ファルシオン　ここに記す。
女神ルティアナが　光の河と化した後 竜族が他種を統べるべきと主張する　ナドラガ神と 弟妹である六神との間で　争いが起きた。
肉体を失った　種族神たちが　最後のチカラを 断罪の剣へと与えることで　ついに ナドラガ神を打ち倒すことに　成功したのだ。
しかし　勝利した　グランゼニス神もまた チカラを使い果たし　回復のため 永き眠りを　必要とされることになった。
眠りにつく前に　我が主 人間の神　グランゼニスは 神を失う世界のため　いくつかの手を打たれた。
始まりの大魔王　ゴダとの会談も そのひとつである。

trans-unit.resname:
「……………………。
「あっ　ごめんなさい　ぼーっとして。 　ちょっと　今の魔物が　気になって……。
「今の魔物からは　グランゼニスさまのものとは 　別のチカラを感じたの。 　あれは　まるで……魔の…………。
「……気になるけど 　足を止めて　考えるより 　先に進むべきよね。
「さあ　進みましょう　。 　目指すは　グランゼニスさまと 　シオンさまが待つ　最深部よ！
trans-unit.source:
......
Ah, sorry about that. I was spacing out for a moment. I was just a bit curious about that monster...
I felt a different kind of power from that monster. It was almost like...it was a demon...
I do wonder, but now's not the time to stop and think about it. We need to move on.
Let's keep going! I'm sure Gran Zenith and Shion are waiting for us at the end!
trans-unit.target:
......
Ah, sorry about that. I was spacing out for a moment. I was just a bit curious about that monster...
I felt a different kind of power from that monster. It was almost like...it was a demon...
I do wonder, but now's not the time to stop and think about it. We need to move on.
Let's keep going! I'm sure Gran Zenith and Shion are waiting for us at the end!

context-group.context:
「……………………。
「あっ　ごめんなさい　ぼーっとして。 　ちょっと　今の魔物が　気になって……。
「今の魔物からは　グランゼニスさまのものとは 　別のチカラを感じたの。 　あれは　まるで……魔の…………。
「……気になるけど 　足を止めて　考えるより 　先に進むべきよね。
「さあ　進みましょう　。 　目指すは　グランゼニスさまと 　シオンさまが待つ　最深部よ！

trans-unit.resname:
神話時代の終焉　第二章 ー　ゴダとの会談　ー
アストルティアから　切り離されて以降 戦乱に明け暮れていた魔界を　統一した 始まりの大魔王　ゴダ。
グランゼニス神が　秘密裏に申し込んだ　会談を 意外にも　ゴダは承諾した。
アストルティアと　魔界。 それぞれの民を　憂う気持ちは　じつのところ 神も大魔王も　変わらなかったのである。
アストルティアと魔界の　和解。 神と大魔王は　意志を同じくしていたが 悲しいかな　それは　かなわなかった。
大魔王とは　統治者の称号にすぎない。 魔界に生きる　魔族たちの怨嗟は いかんともしがたいものであったのだ。
trans-unit.source:
The End of the Mythical Age, Chapter Two A Meeting with Goda
Goda, the first Demon Lord, unified the Demon World after countless years of war ever since it separated from Astoltia.
Surprisingly, Goda accepted Gran Zenith's request for a secret meeting.
Astoltia and the Demon World... The feelings of concern for their respective peoples were the same for both god and
Demon Lord.
Both god and Demon Lord wished to see the reconcilation of Astoltia and the Demon World, but alasーit was not meant to be.
The Demon Lord is but a mere title. The hatred of the demons living in the Demon World was something unsatable.
trans-unit.target:
The End of the Mythical Age, Chapter Two A Meeting with Goda
Goda, the first Demon Lord, unified the Demon World after countless years of war ever since it separated from Astoltia.
Surprisingly, Goda accepted Gran Zenith's request for a secret meeting.
Astoltia and the Demon World... The feelings of concern for their respective peoples were the same for both god and
Demon Lord.
Both god and Demon Lord wished to see the reconcilation of Astoltia and the Demon World, but alasーit was not meant to be.
The Demon Lord is but a mere title. The hatred of the demons living in the Demon World was something unsatable.

context-group.context:
神話時代の終焉　第二章 ー　ゴダとの会談　ー
アストルティアから　切り離されて以降 戦乱に明け暮れていた魔界を　統一した 始まりの大魔王　ゴダ。
グランゼニス神が　秘密裏に申し込んだ　会談を 意外にも　ゴダは承諾した。
アストルティアと　魔界。 それぞれの民を　憂う気持ちは　じつのところ 神も大魔王も　変わらなかったのである。
アストルティアと魔界の　和解。 神と大魔王は　意志を同じくしていたが 悲しいかな　それは　かなわなかった。
大魔王とは　統治者の称号にすぎない。 魔界に生きる　魔族たちの怨嗟は いかんともしがたいものであったのだ。

trans-unit.resname:
「今度は　３種類の魔物が　同時に…… 　とにかく　勝てて　よかったわ。 　ありがとう　。
「きっと　この先に見える 　大きな建物が　グランゼニスさまと 　シオンさまの待つ　最深部ね。
「！　最後まで 　油断せずに　行きましょうね。
trans-unit.source:
So three kinds of monsters attacked us this time... Anyways, I'm glad we won. Thank you, .
That large building ahead must be where Gran Zenith and Shion are waiting.
Let's make sure to keep our guard up until the very end!
trans-unit.target:
So three kinds of monsters attacked us this time... Anyways, I'm glad we won. Thank you, .
That large building ahead must be where Gran Zenith and Shion are waiting.
Let's make sure to keep our guard up until the very end!

context-group.context:
「今度は　３種類の魔物が　同時に…… 　とにかく　勝てて　よかったわ。 　ありがとう　。
「きっと　この先に見える 　大きな建物が　グランゼニスさまと 　シオンさまの待つ　最深部ね。
「！　最後まで 　油断せずに　行きましょうね。

trans-unit.resname:
神話時代の終焉　第三章 ー　勇者の誕生　ー
魔族たちの怨嗟を　晴らすため　大魔王ゴダは アストルティアへの侵攻を　宣言した。
一方　グランゼニス神は　大魔王の侵攻に反応して 神の加護を受けし　人の子……勇者が生まれるよう 残されたチカラを　ふりしぼったのである。
それゆえ　勇者が双子……ひとつのチカラを ふたりで分け合うカタチで　生まれたとき すでに　グランゼニス神は　眠りにつかれていた。
先の戦いでは　私　ファルシオンも消耗した。 成長した　双子の勇者と　ゴダの戦いへ 加勢することは　かなわないだろう。
せめて　グランゼニス宮の　巫女たちには 我が意を伝えてから　眠りにつくことにしよう。
双子の勇者は　本来　ひとつの存在。 等しく　いつくしみ　育てるように……と。
trans-unit.source:
The End of the Mythical Age, Chapter Three The Birth of the Hero
To quell the demons' resentment, the Demon Lord Goda ordered the invasion of Astoltia.
In response to this invasion, Gran Zenith exerted the last of His remaining power, so that a child of man, blessed with divine
power, would be born. This was the Hero.
Thus, when the Hero was born as twins and shared a single power between them... Gran Zenith had already fallen into slumber.
In the previous battle, I, Falchion, was also forced to use much of my power. I don't think I will be able to assist the twin Heroes
in their battle against Goda.
At the very least, before I too fall to slumber... I shall convey this message to the maidens of Gran Zenith's Palace.
"The twin Heroes are, by nature, a single entity. Cherish them equally, and nurture them with compassion..."
trans-unit.target:
The End of the Mythical Age, Chapter Three The Birth of the Hero
To quell the demons' resentment, the Demon Lord Goda ordered the invasion of Astoltia.
In response to this invasion, Gran Zenith exerted the last of His remaining power, so that a child of man, blessed with divine

Thus, when the Hero was born as twins and shared a single power between them... Gran Zenith had already fallen into slumber.
In the previous battle, I, Falchion, was also forced to use much of my power. I don't think I will be able to assist the twin Heroes
in their battle against Goda.
At the very least, before I too fall to slumber... I shall convey this message to the maidens of Gran Zenith's Palace.
"The twin Heroes are, by nature, a single entity. Cherish them equally, and nurture them with compassion..."

trans-unit.resname:
「大魔王たる者　何を差しおいても 　まず　強くなければな！　猛者ぞろいの魔界の 　頂点に立つ者としては　当然のことじゃ。
「じゃが　強さだけでは　統治者たりえん。 　配下の魔族や魔王たちを　心酔させ　従わせて 　初めて　大魔王と呼べるじゃろう。
「……たかだか 　３人の魔王さえ　従えることもできない　ぬしを 　大魔王とは　認められん！
「くふふ……ヨナちゃんの裁定に　納得がいかぬ。 　そんな顔を　しておるな？
「ならば　３人の魔王たちに　ぬしへの忠誠を 　誓わせてみよ！　ぬしが　真に 　大魔王たる者であれば……容易なはずじゃろ？
trans-unit.source:
A Demon Lord is strong above all else! It's only natural for a leader of the Demon World, a place full of fierce fighters!
But strength alone isn't enough. You can only be called Demon Lord if the Demon Kings and lower demons worship and obey you.
You can't even get the three Demon Kings to obey you, so no way in heck am I recognizing you as a Demon Lord!
Nee hee hee...you don't look very satisfied. I can tell by your face.
Then, get the three Demon Kings to swear their allegiance to you! If you're REALLY a Demon Lord...then it'll be easy, right?
trans-unit.target:
A Demon Lord is strong above all else! It's only natural for a leader of the Demon World, a place full of fierce fighters!
But strength alone isn't enough. You can only be called Demon Lord if the Demon Kings and lower demons worship and obey you.
You can't even get the three Demon Kings to obey you, so no way in heck am I recognizing you as a Demon Lord!
Nee hee hee...you don't look very satisfied. I can tell by your face.
Then, get the three Demon Kings to swear their allegiance to you! If you're REALLY a Demon Lord...then it'll be easy, right?

context-group.context:
「大魔王たる者　何を差しおいても 　まず　強くなければな！　猛者ぞろいの魔界の 　頂点に立つ者としては　当然のことじゃ。
「じゃが　強さだけでは　統治者たりえん。 　配下の魔族や魔王たちを　心酔させ　従わせて 　初めて　大魔王と呼べるじゃろう。
「……たかだか 　３人の魔王さえ　従えることもできない　ぬしを 　大魔王とは　認められん！
「くふふ……ヨナちゃんの裁定に　納得がいかぬ。 　そんな顔を　しておるな？
「ならば　３人の魔王たちに　ぬしへの忠誠を 　誓わせてみよ！　ぬしが　真に 　大魔王たる者であれば……容易なはずじゃろ？

trans-unit.resname:
「……始まりの大魔王　ゴダ。 　歴史上　初めて　魔界を統一した男じゃ。
「当時の魔界は　今からは　想像できんほど 　アストルティアへの憎悪に　燃えていてのぅ…… 　それを統べた　ゴダは　いかに偉大だったか。
「年月とともに　憎悪は薄れ　魔族たちも 　軟弱になっていき……現代の魔族など 　ヨナちゃんからすると　なげかわしいほどじゃ！
「ゴダの代行者として　創り出されてから 　ずっと　魔界を見守ってきたが……ゴダを超える 　大魔王など　ついぞ　現れなかったわ。
trans-unit.source:
The first Demon Lord, Goda... He was the first man in history to unify the Demon World.
Back then, the Demon World had a ridiculous amount of hatred towards Astoltia...pretty hard to imagine now.
Goda was amazing to be able to rule through it all.
As the years went on, the demons' hatred faded away and they got weaker... I find these modern demons PATHETIC!
I've been watching over the Demon World ever since Goda appointed me as his representative...but not a single Demon Lord
has appeared that's been able to surpass him.
trans-unit.target:
The first Demon Lord, Goda... He was the first man in history to unify the Demon World.
Back then, the Demon World had a ridiculous amount of hatred towards Astoltia...pretty hard to imagine now.
Goda was amazing to be able to rule through it all.
As the years went on, the demons' hatred faded away and they got weaker... I find these modern demons PATHETIC!
I've been watching over the Demon World ever since Goda appointed me as his representative...but not a single Demon Lord
has appeared that's been able to surpass him.

context-group.context:
「……始まりの大魔王　ゴダ。 　歴史上　初めて　魔界を統一した男じゃ。
「当時の魔界は　今からは　想像できんほど 　アストルティアへの憎悪に　燃えていてのぅ…… 　それを統べた　ゴダは　いかに偉大だったか。
「年月とともに　憎悪は薄れ　魔族たちも 　軟弱になっていき……現代の魔族など 　ヨナちゃんからすると　なげかわしいほどじゃ！
「ゴダの代行者として　創り出されてから 　ずっと　魔界を見守ってきたが……ゴダを超える 　大魔王など　ついぞ　現れなかったわ。

trans-unit.resname:
「ふふふ～！　この　カワイイ～ 　ヨナちゃんについて知りたいとは…… 　正直なやつめ♥
「ヨナちゃんはな。始まりの大魔王ゴダと 　その子にして　初代魔仙卿　ジャディンが 　創り出した　存在なのじゃ！
「ヨナちゃんは　大魔王ゴダの　代行者……。 　いつの日か　この試練場を訪れる　大魔王を 　ゴダに代わって　裁定するのが　役目。
「ゆえに　魔界のすべてを 　見通す目を　与えられておるのじゃ！ 　どうじゃ　すごいじゃろ～♥
「まあ……万年単位で　ヒマすぎて 　この目で見ていたものなど　カワイイ～ 　女子のファッションが　メインじゃが……。
「今のヨナちゃんの姿も　カワイイ～じゃろ！？ 　イチバンのお気に入りで　かれこれ 　５００年ほどは　この姿なのじゃ♥
trans-unit.source:
Hee hee hee! You want to know about cutie little me, huh? You're so honest... ♥
I was created by Goda, the first Demon Lord, and his son, Jyadainーthe first Oracle!
I'm a representative of Goda's...and my role is to judge the Demon Lord who will one day visit these trial grounds on his behalf.
Therefore, I've been given eyes that can see aaaaaall throughout the Demon World! Isn't that just amazing? ♥
Well...since I've had so much free time over the past thousands of years, most of what I've seen has just been totally adorbs!
Especially girl's fashion...
But isn't my look just super cute, too?! It's my absolute fave, and I've been this way for about 500 years now! ♥
trans-unit.target:
Hee hee hee! You want to know about cutie little me, huh? You're so honest... ♥
I was created by Goda, the first Demon Lord, and his son, Jyadainーthe first Oracle!
I'm a representative of Goda's...and my role is to judge the Demon Lord who will one day visit these trial grounds on his behalf.
Therefore, I've been given eyes that can see aaaaaall throughout the Demon World! Isn't that just amazing? ♥

Especially girl's fashion...
But isn't my look just super cute, too?! It's my absolute fave, and I've been this way for about 500 years now! ♥

context-group.context:
「ふふふ～！　この　カワイイ～ 　ヨナちゃんについて知りたいとは…… 　正直なやつめ♥
「ヨナちゃんはな。始まりの大魔王ゴダと 　その子にして　初代魔仙卿　ジャディンが 　創り出した　存在なのじゃ！

trans-unit.resname:
「なんじゃろうな……。
「万年単位で　カワイイ～を探求している 　ヨナちゃんじゃが　いまだに　わからん。 　いや　永遠の時をかけても　わからんじゃろう。
「じゃが　これだけは　わかる！ 　カワイイ～には　正解も不正解も　ないのじゃ！
「もし　ぬしも　カワイイ～の探究者ならば 　ぬしのカワイイ～を　つらぬくのじゃぞ♥
trans-unit.source:
I wonder...
I've been searching for what "cute" is for thousands of years, but I still don't quite get it. No, I could probably spend an eternity
trying to figure it out and I probably never will...
But there's one thing I do get! When it comes to cute, there's no right or wrong answer!
If you too are a seeker of the cute, then stay true to your own sense! ♥
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.resname:
グランゼニスの試練場に　いざないの石碑が 現れました。ルーラストーンを使って 試練場に　行くことができます。
今後　グランゼニスの試練場に 勇者姫アンルシアは　同行しません。 その代わり　パーティと共に　進めます。
また　グランゼニスの試練場で ドルボードに　乗れるようになりました。 聖天のつばさを使えば　空も飛べます。
trans-unit.source:
A Zoomethyst has appeared within the Trial of Gran Zenith. You may now enter the trial via Zoomstone.
From this point, Anlucia will not accompany you in the trialーinstead, your normal party will.
Also, you may now ride a Dolboard within the trial. You may also fly using the Wonderwing.
trans-unit.target:

Also, you may now ride a Dolboard within the trial. You may also fly using the Wonderwing.

trans-unit.resname:
「これは　大魔王様！ 　ユシュカ様に　ご用が　おありなのですか？
「でしたら　ファラザード城の 　玉座の間へ　どうぞ！ 　ユシュカ様は　そちらに　いらっしゃいますよ。
trans-unit.source:
It's the Demon Lord! Is there something you need from King Yushka?
If so, please make your way to the throne room in the castle! He will be waiting for you there.
trans-unit.target:
It's the Demon Lord! Is there something you need from King Yushka?
If so, please make your way to the throne room in the castle! He will be waiting for you there.

context-group.context:
「これは　大魔王様！ 　ユシュカ様に　ご用が　おありなのですか？
「でしたら　ファラザード城の 　玉座の間へ　どうぞ！ 　ユシュカ様は　そちらに　いらっしゃいますよ。

trans-unit.resname:
「ゼクレスは　戦争に備えてか　城下全体を 　完全に　閉ざしているようだ。 　こちらは　俺のほうで　調べておこう。
「は　バルディスタの魔王 　ヴァレリアに　忠誠を誓わせると同時に 　戦争回避の糸口を　つかんできてほしい。
「ふたたび……共に。魔界を救おう！
「……ところで　お前が連れている 　ラキとかいう子供……変わった耳をしているな。 　まさか　プクリポってわけじゃ　ないよな？
trans-unit.source:
Zechres is preparing for war and they look to have sealed themselves off completely. I'll go and check that out for myself.
I want you to head to Valdista and see if you can't get Valeria to swear her allegiance to you.
Once again...we'll save the Demon World. Together!
By the wayーthat kid, Lycae... He's got some weird looking ears. He's not a Pukulipo, is he?
trans-unit.target:
Zechres is preparing for war and they look to have sealed themselves off completely. I'll go and check that out for myself.

Once again...we'll save the Demon World. Together!
By the wayーthat kid, Lycae... He's got some weird looking ears. He's not a Pukulipo, is he?

context-group.context:
「ゼクレスは　戦争に備えてか　城下全体を 　完全に　閉ざしているようだ。 　こちらは　俺のほうで　調べておこう。

trans-unit.resname:
「……意外だったな。ユシュカは 　君と行きたがるとばかり　思っていた。 　いや　行きたい気持ちは　あるのだろう。
「だが　ユシュカは 　魔王としての責任を　果たすことを…… 　何より　君を信じて任せることを　選んだ。
「ならば　私も　我が主の選択を　支えよう。 　殿……ゼクレスについての 　情報収集は　私たちに任せてくれ。
trans-unit.source:
How unexpected...I thought for sure that Yushka would have wanted to go with you. No...I'm sure that he does.
But he also wants to fulfill his responsibilities as Demon King...and more than anything, has decided to place his
trust in you that you will see this done.
In that case, I support his choice. Please leave the investigation of Zechres to us.

trans-unit.resname:
「大魔王様ッ！ 　ヴァレリア様は　現在　玉座の間には 　いらっしゃらないのであーる！
「ヴァレリア様に　ご用なら 　エレベーターで　ヴァリースタジアムへ行き 　フセットという男と　話してほしいのであーる！
trans-unit.source:
D-Demon Lord! Lady Valeria is currently not in the throne room!
If you have business with her, please take the elevator to the Valley Stadium and speak with a man named Fusett!
trans-unit.target:
D-Demon Lord! Lady Valeria is currently not in the throne room!
If you have business with her, please take the elevator to the Valley Stadium and speak with a man named Fusett!

context-group.context:
「大魔王様ッ！ 　ヴァレリア様は　現在　玉座の間には 　いらっしゃらないのであーる！

trans-unit.resname: ヴァリースタジアムに 行きますか？<yesno><close>
trans-unit.source: Go to the Valley Stadium?<yesno><close>
trans-unit.target: Go to the Valley Stadium?<yesno><close>

context-group.context: ヴァリースタジアムに 行きますか？<yesno><close>

trans-unit.resname:
「これは　大魔王様！　ヴァリーブートキャンプへ 　ご参加でしたら……って　え？ 　ヴァレリア様に　ご用があると……？
「……ヴァレリア様は　現在　取り込み中でして。 　どうしてもと言うなら　お取り次ぎしますが…… 　大魔王様。覚悟は　よろしいですか？
trans-unit.source:
The Demon Lord! If you'd like to participate in the Valley Boot Camp, then... Huh? You have some business with Lady Valeria...?
...She's currently busy at the moment. If you insist, then I can let her know... Are you ready?
trans-unit.target:
The Demon Lord! If you'd like to participate in the Valley Boot Camp, then... Huh? You have some business with Lady Valeria...?
...She's currently busy at the moment. If you insist, then I can let her know... Are you ready?

context-group.context:
「これは　大魔王様！　ヴァリーブートキャンプへ 　ご参加でしたら……って　え？ 　ヴァレリア様に　ご用があると……？
「……ヴァレリア様は　現在　取り込み中でして。 　どうしてもと言うなら　お取り次ぎしますが…… 　大魔王様。覚悟は　よろしいですか？

trans-unit.resname: 「さすがは 大魔王様。 賢明な ご判断です。
trans-unit.source: As I thought... You've chosen well.
trans-unit.target: As I thought... You've chosen well.

context-group.context: 「さすがは 大魔王様。 賢明な ご判断です。

trans-unit.resname: 「本当に いいんですか？ 本当の 本当に…… 覚悟と準備は できているんですね！？<yesno><break>
trans-unit.source: Are you sure? Truly, absolutely sure? Are you ready and prepared for this?!<yesno><break>
trans-unit.target: Are you sure? Truly, absolutely sure? Are you ready and prepared for this?!<yesno><break>

context-group.context: 「本当に いいんですか？ 本当の 本当に…… 覚悟と準備は できているんですね！？<yesno><break>

trans-unit.resname: 「そこまで おっしゃるのなら お取り次ぎいたしましょう……。
trans-unit.source: If that's really what you want, then I'll let her know...
trans-unit.target: If that's really what you want, then I'll let her know...

context-group.context: 「そこまで おっしゃるのなら お取り次ぎいたしましょう……。

trans-unit.resname:
「新兵どもを　ちぎっては投げ！ 　ついには　我らが　ヴァレリア様とも 　互角の勝負……さすがは　大魔王様です！
「大魔王様は　ファラザード城の 　魔王ユシュカに　会いにいかれるのでしたね。 　どうぞ　お気をつけて！
「もし　ヴァリーブートキャンプへの 　参加を　ご所望でしたら　このロビーにいる 　受付のマキシに　声をかけてくださいね。
trans-unit.source:
You tore through those recruits like paper! And you even faced against our Lady Valeria... You truly are the Demon Lord!
So you're headed back to Farazard to meet with its Demon King, Yushka? Please be careful!
If you feel like participating in the Valley Boot Camp, please speak with Makishi at the reception over there.
trans-unit.target:
You tore through those recruits like paper! And you even faced against our Lady Valeria... You truly are the Demon Lord!
So you're headed back to Farazard to meet with its Demon King, Yushka? Please be careful!
If you feel like participating in the Valley Boot Camp, please speak with Makishi at the reception over there.

context-group.context:
「新兵どもを　ちぎっては投げ！ 　ついには　我らが　ヴァレリア様とも 　互角の勝負……さすがは　大魔王様です！
「大魔王様は　ファラザード城の 　魔王ユシュカに　会いにいかれるのでしたね。 　どうぞ　お気をつけて！

trans-unit.resname: <pipipi_npc 8169>「よく 戻ってくれた <pnplacehold>殿。 ユシュカも 君の帰還を 心待ちにしていた。 声を かけてやってくれ。
trans-unit.source: It's good to see you've returned. Yushka has been looking forward to seeing you again. Please speak with him.
trans-unit.target: It's good to see you've returned. Yushka has been looking forward to seeing you again. Please speak with him.

context-group.context: <pipipi_npc 8169>「よく 戻ってくれた <pnplacehold>殿。 ユシュカも 君の帰還を 心待ちにしていた。 声を かけてやってくれ。

trans-unit.resname:
「よく戻ったな　！ 　バルディスタのことを　報告してくれるか？
「……ははは！　あの　ヴァレリアが 　宣誓の左手に　くちづけとはな！ 　その光景を　俺も　見たかったぜ。
「しかし　戦争の件は　やはり 　ゼクレスが　震源地か……。
「あいつめ……何を考えている。
「……ああ　すまない。ゼクレスについて 　調査を続けていたが　城下は閉ざされたままだ。 　あれでは　大魔王といえど　通さないだろう。
「だが……覚えてるか　？ 　ゼクレス城の　秘密の抜け道を　通ったことが 　あっただろう。あれが　使えそうだ。
「ベルヴァインの森西。 　その最北端にある　滝見の広場へ向かうんだ。
「滝見の広場の　奥の扉から　抜け道へ…… 　そこを進んでいくと 　ゼクレス城に　侵入できるはず。
「もし　すでに　ゲートを開けているなら 　ゼクレス城の　宝物庫までなら 　アビスジュエルで　行けるはずだ。
「今のゼクレスでは　何が起こるか　わからない。 　どうか　気をつけてくれ。
trans-unit.source:
You're back, ! Could you let me know what happened in Valdista?
...Hahaha! Valeria kissed the hand, huh? I would've loved to see that!
But as for the war...Zechres was the cause of it all...
Just what is that idiot thinking...?
Ah, sorry. I've been trying to investigate Zechres, but the whole town's closed off. Not even the Demon Lord can get in.
But...you remember, don't you? The secret passage in Zechres Castle? That could be useful.
Head for Fallsview Plaza in the western Belvain Forest, at the northernmost end.
Go through the door in the back and into the passage... Through there, you should be able to get into the castle.
If you've opened the nearby Abyss Gate already, then you can use it to get there quicker.
We have no idea what's going on in Zechres, so please watch yourself.
trans-unit.target:
You're back, ! Could you let me know what happened in Valdista?
...Hahaha! Valeria kissed the hand, huh? I would've loved to see that!
But as for the war...Zechres was the cause of it all...
Just what is that idiot thinking...?
Ah, sorry. I've been trying to investigate Zechres, but the whole town's closed off. Not even the Demon Lord can get in.
But...you remember, don't you? The secret passage in Zechres Castle? That could be useful.

Go through the door in the back and into the passage... Through there, you should be able to get into the castle.
If you've opened the nearby Abyss Gate already, then you can use it to get there quicker.
We have no idea what's going on in Zechres, so please watch yourself.

「今のゼクレスでは　何が起こるか　わからない。 　どうか　気をつけてくれ。

trans-unit.resname:
「ユシュカは　ヴァレリアの宣誓を笑うが 　私とて　ユシュカの宣誓には　驚いた。
「まさか　他者の目に　さらされながら 　大魔王への忠誠を誓うとは……あのユシュカが。
「以前の私であれば 　目の前の光景を　信じなかったことだろう。 　つまり……君と出会う前の　私であればな。
trans-unit.source:
Yushka laughed at Valeria's oath, but even I was surprised when he gave his.
I never would've imagined him of all people to swear allegiance to the Demon Lord in front of so many others...
If it were the old me, my eyes wouldn't have believed what they were seeing.
That is to say...the me before I met you.
trans-unit.target:

That is to say...the me before I met you.

trans-unit.resname: ゼクレス魔導国・入口の アビスゲートが 開かれたようだ。<se_nots System 7>
trans-unit.source: The Zechres - Entry Abyss Gate has opened.<se_nots System 7>
trans-unit.target: The Zechres - Entry Abyss Gate has opened.<se_nots System 7>

context-group.context: ゼクレス魔導国・入口の アビスゲートが 開かれたようだ。<se_nots System 7>

trans-unit.resname:
「申し訳ありません　大魔王様！ 　城には誰も入れるなと　我らが魔王様より 　きつく　申しつかっております。
「魔王様との謁見を　ご希望でしたら 　見目うるわしい優男を　連れてきてください。 　それならば　魔王様も　お会いになるはず！
trans-unit.source:
My apologies, Demon Lord! The Demon King has strict orders that no one may enter the castle.
If you wish to meet with them, then please bring a handsome and gentle-looking man here. Do that, and they'd be happy to see you!
trans-unit.target:
My apologies, Demon Lord! The Demon King has strict orders that no one may enter the castle.
If you wish to meet with them, then please bring a handsome and gentle-looking man here. Do that, and they'd be happy to see you!

context-group.context:
「申し訳ありません　大魔王様！ 　城には誰も入れるなと　我らが魔王様より 　きつく　申しつかっております。
「魔王様との謁見を　ご希望でしたら 　見目うるわしい優男を　連れてきてください。 　それならば　魔王様も　お会いになるはず！

trans-unit.resname:
「私には　見えるのです……。 　様は 　シオン様を　お捜しなのでしょう？
「でしたら　グランゼドーラ城　３階の 　テラスへ行かれると　よろしいでしょう。
「そこに　シオン様とグランゼニス神と…… 　アンルシア様も　いらっしゃいます。皆さまが 　そこへ向かうのを　見ておりましたから。
「ちなみに　テラスとは　この部屋のものでは 　ありませんよ。いったん　この西の塔を出て 　２階へ下りる階段近くの扉から　出られます。
trans-unit.source:
I can see it... Are you looking for Shion, by any chance?
If so, then I suggest you make your way to the terrace on the third floor.
There you will find Shion, Gran Zenith, and Anlucia...I saw all of them headed that way.
By the way, I do not mean the terrace from this room.
After leaving the western tower, you can get there through the door near the stairs leading to the second floor.
trans-unit.target:
I can see it... Are you looking for Shion, by any chance?
If so, then I suggest you make your way to the terrace on the third floor.
There you will find Shion, Gran Zenith, and Anlucia...I saw all of them headed that way.
By the way, I do not mean the terrace from this room.
After leaving the western tower, you can get there through the door near the stairs leading to the second floor.

trans-unit.resname:
「ようこそ　さん。 　もしや　シオンさまを　お捜しですか？
「でしたら　この３階の南にある　テラスへと 　向かってください。アンルシアさまたちと 　ご一緒に　いらっしゃるはずです。
trans-unit.source:
Welcome, . Are you perhaps looking for Mr. Shion?
You'll want to make your way to the terrace on the third floor, then. He should be there with Ms. Anlucia.

trans-unit.resname:
「シオン殿ほどの　美男でしたら 　魔王様のお眼鏡にも　かなうでしょう！
「みなさまの訪問は　魔王様の　しもべである 　ホーストという男に　伝えておきます。 　城へ入り　玉座の間へ　お進みください。
trans-unit.source:
I'm sure someone as handsome as Shion will catch the Demon King's fancy!
A man named Horst, who is a servant of the Demon King, will be informed of your visit. Please enter the castle and make your way
to the throne room.

context-group.context: ゼクレス城の アビスゲートが 開かれたようだ。<se_nots System 7>

trans-unit.resname:
「だっ…大魔王様！ 　本当に　大魔王　様だ！ 　よくぞ　来てくださいました……！
「魔王様に　ご用……なのですよね？ 　ならば　まずは　階段で 　２階へと　お進みください。
「２階にあるエレベーターで　３階へ。 　そこから　さらに　階段を上ると 　魔王様のいらっしゃる　玉座の間です。
trans-unit.source:
T...the Demon Lord! It's really the Demon Lord! Thank you for coming!
You have business...with the Demon King, yes? Then please take the stairs to the second floor first.
Once there, take the elevator to the third floor, and then use the stairs to reach the throne room.
trans-unit.target:
T...the Demon Lord! It's really the Demon Lord! Thank you for coming!

Once there, take the elevator to the third floor, and then use the stairs to reach the throne room.

trans-unit.resname:
「ラキをくれるなら　アンタに忠誠を 　誓うフリくらい　してあげてもいいけど。 　……無理？　じゃあ　帰って。
「……ふうん。 　ファラザード城の　ユシュカに会いにいくのね。
「私　ユシュカなんて　大っ嫌い！ 　以前　この私が招待してあげた　パーティーを 　すっぽかしたのよ！？　許せないわ！
trans-unit.source:
If you give me Lycae, then I'll pretend to be loyal to you. ...What? You won't? Then go away.
Hmph... You're going to see Yushka in Farazard?
I HATE Yushka! You think you can just skip out on a party that I invite you to?! I'll never forgive him!!

trans-unit.resname:
「大魔王様と会えるなんて　感動っす！ 　だから　オレ……オレ……！
「……大魔王様の！ 　ちょっと　いいとこ　見てみたい！
「はい　飲～んで　飲んで　飲んで！ 　飲～んで　飲んで　飲んで！
「まほうのせいすい　飲んじゃってー！
trans-unit.source:
I'm so thrilled to be able meet the Demon Lord! That's why I... I...!
I want to see your good side!
Here, let's drink! Drink! Drink! Drink some more, drink some more!
Drink the Magic Water!

trans-unit.source: Welcome back! Can you tell me about what you did in Zechres?<yesno><break>

trans-unit.resname: 「そうか……もし 俺のチカラが必要なら また いつでも来てくれ。

trans-unit.resname:
「……なに？　本来の 　ゼクレスの魔王は　リンベリィじゃない？ 　創失した　アスバル……？
「創失の呪いにより　創生のチカラが奪われると 　その人物の　存在どころか 　記憶さえ　失われるというのか……。
「じつのところ　この俺も 　アスバルという名に　心当たりはない。 　ナジーン　お前は　どうだ？
trans-unit.source:
...What? Linberry isn't supposed to be the Demon King of Zechres? This unmade Asbal is...?
So when the curse of unmaking takes away the power of creation, not only is that person's existence erased, but other's
memories of them, too...?
Honestly, I don't remember anyone named Asbal. What about you, Najinn?

trans-unit.resname: <pipipi_npc 8169>「私も……前ゼクレス魔王夫妻に 子がなく 遠縁にあたる ベラストル家の当主リンベリィが 王座を継いだと 記憶しています。
trans-unit.source:
I don't, either...
I remember that the previous Demon King and his wife had no children, and Linberry of House Belastre inherited the throne.
trans-unit.target:
I don't, either...

trans-unit.resname:
「ああ　俺も　まったく同じだ。 　もちろん　を 　疑ってるわけじゃないんだが……
「にわかには　信じがたい話だな。 　ただ　お前が言うのなら　事実なんだろう。
「……最近のゼクレスの統治は　あきらかに 　異常だった。魔王が　急に　すげ替わったのが 　原因なら　むしろ　納得できるほどだ。
trans-unit.source:
Yeah...I feel the same. Of course, I don't doubt what says, but...
It's pretty hard to believe. But, if you say so, then it has to be true.
Zechres' rule lately has definitely been weird. If a sudden change in Demon King is the reason, then that definitely explains it.

「これは　大魔王様！ 　魔王ユシュカ様と　魔王ヴァレリア様は 　ご自身の国へ　お帰りになりましたよ。
「イルーシャ様も　ラキとかいう少年とともに 　西翼にある　ご自分の部屋に　戻られました。
「大魔王様は……レイジバルスを追って 　ガウシア樹海の　呪いの泉の近くへ……？ 　よくわかりませんが　お気を付けて！
trans-unit.source:
Your Majesty! Sir Yushka and Miss Valeria have both returned to their respective countries.

「この　抜けてる杭と　ロープをどければ 　あたしたちも　ここを通れそうだね。
trans-unit.source:
...Huh? A stake's missing. Maybe Regibalus forced his way through here?
If we remove the loose stake and rope, then we should be able to get through.

trans-unit.resname:
古びた本棚に　並ぶ書物は　なぜか 新品同様の状態を　保っている……。 は　１冊の手記を　手に取ってみた。
王としての日々は　どうにも　息が詰まる。 魔術で作り出した分身に　政務を任せ この場所を訪れるのが　ささやかな楽しみだ。
ここに連れてくるのは　使い魔の　小鬼だけ。 よちよちと蝶を追いかけたり　本を読む私の膝で 眠りこける小鬼の姿に　何よりも癒される。
魔界東部を荒らしていた　不死の巨人。 その正体は　濃厚な魔瘴に触れ　突然変異を起こし 痛みと混乱から暴れていた　小さな魔物だった。
私が　痛みと魔力を抑える　まじないを施すと 元の姿を取り戻した　小鬼は 涙を流して　私の足に　しがみついてきた。
そばを離れようとしないので　つい情がわいて 名を与え　使い魔の契約を交わしたが…… 今や　ただのペットである。
城の使用人たちからは　菓子をもらうなどして かわいがられ　まだ幼い子どもたちにとっては よき遊び相手と　いったところだ。
レイジバルス……不死の巨人との激闘を 思い返しながら　つけた名前だが…… この愛らしい小
trans-unit.source:
For some reason, the books lined up in this ancient-looking bookcase all look to be in brand new condition...
picks up a book filled with notes.
My days as king are suffocating. I entrust governmental affairs to a duplicate I've created by magic, and visiting this place
is a small pleasure of mine.
The only one that I bring here is a little impーmy familiar. Watching it chase after butterflies or fall asleep on my lap while I
read is more soothing than anything else.
The immortal titan that rampaged the eastern Demon World...its true form was that of a small monster.
It had undergone a sudden mutation after being exposed to dense miasmaーdriven to rage by pain and confusion.
When I cast a spell to suppress its pain and magical power, the imp returned to its original form. It clung to my leg with tears
streaming down its face.
Since it refused to leave my side, I began to grow attached to it. I gave it a name, and even formed a contract with it...but now,
it's nothing more than a pet.
The castle's servants adore it, and they often give it treats. It also serves as a great playmate for the children.
Regibalus...I thought of this name when I recalled the fierce battle with the immortal titan.
But, perhaps...it's an ill-fitting name for such an adorable little imp.
trans-unit.target:
For some reason, the books lined up in this ancient-looking bookcase all look to be in brand new condition...
picks up a book filled with notes.
My days as king are suffocating. I entrust governmental affairs to a duplicate I've created by magic, and visiting this place
is a small pleasure of mine.
The only one that I bring here is a little impーmy familiar. Watching it chase after butterflies or fall asleep on my lap while I
read is more soothing than anything else.
The immortal titan that rampaged the eastern Demon World...its true form was that of a small monster.
It had undergone a sudden mutation after being exposed to dense miasmaーdriven to rage by pain and confusion.
When I cast a spell to suppress its pain and magical power, the imp returned to its original form. It clung to my leg with tears
streaming down its face.
Since it refused to leave my side, I began to grow attached to it. I gave it a name, and even formed a contract with it...but now,
it's nothing more than a pet.
The castle's servants adore it, and they often give it treats. It also serves as a great playmate for the children.
Regibalus...I thought of this name when I recalled the fierce battle with the immortal titan.
But, perhaps...it's an ill-fitting name for such an adorable little imp.

context-group.context:
古びた本棚に　並ぶ書物は　なぜか 新品同様の状態を　保っている……。 は　１冊の手記を　手に取ってみた。
王としての日々は　どうにも　息が詰まる。 魔術で作り出した分身に　政務を任せ この場所を訪れるのが　ささやかな楽しみだ。
ここに連れてくるのは　使い魔の　小鬼だけ。 よちよちと蝶を追いかけたり　本を読む私の膝で 眠りこける小鬼の姿に　何よりも癒される。
魔界東部を荒らしていた　不死の巨人。 その正体は　濃厚な魔瘴に触れ　突然変異を起こし 痛みと混乱から暴れていた　小さな魔物だった。
私が　痛みと魔力を抑える　まじないを施すと 元の姿を取り戻した　小鬼は 涙を流して　私の足に　しがみついてきた。
そばを離れようとしないので　つい情がわいて 名を与え　使い魔の契約を交わしたが…… 今や　ただのペットである。
城の使用人たちからは　菓子をもらうなどして かわいがられ　まだ幼い子どもたちにとっては よき遊び相手と　いったところだ。
レイジバルス……不死の巨人との激闘を 思い返しながら　つけた名前だが…… この愛らしい小鬼には　不似合いかもしれない。

trans-unit.resname:
古びた本棚に　並ぶ書物は　なぜか 新品同様の状態を　保っている……。 は　１冊の手記を　手に取ってみた。
ゼクレスという国を建て　大魔王の座についた。 アストルティア侵攻を　先送りにし続けて 阻止したことは　正しかったと　今も信じている。
長い長い　生だった。私は　まもなく死ぬだろう。 私が　なすべきことは　すべてなした。 後悔はないが　心残りが　ひとつ。
それは　レイジバルスを　置いていくことだ。 まじないによって　元の姿を取りもどしはしたが 不死の巨人としての性質は　有したままの小鬼。
莫大なチカラを　持てあましながら 終わりなき生を　過ごすのは　つらかろう。 私ならば　不死の巨人を　死なせてやれる。
『私と共に　逝くか？』　たずねると しかし　レイジバルスは　首を横に振った。 私が死んだ後は　私の子孫と　共にいたいのだと。
私の代わりに　子孫たちを　守りたいのだと…… 愛しき小鬼が　たどたどしくも　そう答えたとき 私は　あふれる涙を　止められなかった。
救済として　死を押し付けようなどと 私は　いつの間に　傲
trans-unit.source:
For some reason, the books lined up in this ancient-looking bookcase all look to be in brand new condition...
picks up a book filled with notes.
I founded a nation known as Zechres, and took the throne as Demon Lord.
I continued to postpone the invasion of Astoltia, and even now, I believe that was the right decision.
I've lived a long, long life, and I will soon die. I've done everything that I was meant to. I have no regrets.
However...there is one thing that I cannot let go of.
That is leaving Regibalus behind. Though my spell restored its original form, it remains an imp with the nature of an
immortal titan.
Possessing such overwhelming power, enduring an unending life must be painful... If it were up to me, I could grant it a
peaceful death.
"Will you pass on with me?" I asked. But Regibalus simply shook its head. It wished to stay with my descendants after
I am gone.
It wanted to protect them in my stead... When my little imp gave this answer, I could not hold back my tears...
When did I become so arrogant...thinking that I could impose death as a way to salvation?
My beloved familiar... May you be happy for all of eternity...
trans-unit.target:

However...there is one thing that I cannot let go of.
That is leaving Regibalus behind. Though my spell restored its original form, it remains an imp with the nature of an

Possessing such overwhelming power, enduring an unending life must be painful... If it were up to me, I could grant it a

"Will you pass on with me?" I asked. But Regibalus simply shook its head. It wished to stay with my descendants after
I am gone.
It wanted to protect them in my stead... When my little imp gave this answer, I could not hold back my tears...
When did I become so arrogant...thinking that I could impose death as a way to salvation?
My beloved familiar... May you be happy for all of eternity...

context-group.context: 「私 リンベリィと話したい。 <pnplacehold>……どうか 一緒に ゼクレス城の玉座の間まで 来て。

trans-unit.resname:
「バルメシュケの研究所に　残されているという 　魔界を滅ぼしかねない　魔道具…… 　執行者たちの狙いは　おそらく　それよ。
「王家の使い魔　レイジバルスは 　研究所の入り口を　出現させるための 　鍵だと　言われているの。
「バルメシュケの研究所は 　デスディオ暗黒荒原の　最南端…… 　閉ざされた扉を　進んだ先に　あるらしいわ。
trans-unit.source:
The magical item that can destroy the Demon World is said to be left behind somewhere inside Balmeschke's laboratory...
They also say that Regibalus, our royal familiar, is the key to opening the entrance to that place.
The laboratory is located at the southernmost tip of the Deathdio Darklands...past that closed off door.

trans-unit.resname: <pipipi_npc 12156>「ユシュカたちが 敵を食い止めてくれている。 僕らは 研究所を進み 執行者の たくらみを阻止しよう！
trans-unit.source: <pipipi_npc 12156>Yushka and the others are holding off our enemies. We have to make our way deeper into the lab and stop the enforcers' plans!
trans-unit.target: <pipipi_npc 12156>Yushka and the others are holding off our enemies. We have to make our way deeper into the lab and stop the enforcers' plans!

context-group.context: <pipipi_npc 12156>「ユシュカたちが 敵を食い止めてくれている。 僕らは 研究所を進み 執行者の たくらみを阻止しよう！

trans-unit.resname: どこからともなく 声が聞こえてくる。
trans-unit.source: A voice echoes from afar.
trans-unit.target: A voice echoes from afar.

context-group.context: どこからともなく 声が聞こえてくる。

trans-unit.resname:
「おや……迷える子羊かな？ 　ようこそ　バルメシュケの研究所へ。
「ふふ……ここだよ　ここ。 　君たちの　目の前に 　しかばねが　転がっているだろう？
「それは　いつか　私だったモノ。 　バルメシュケが大魔王だったころ 　ここに侵入し　捕らえられた　盗人の末路……。
「己が無念ゆえか　やつの魔術ゆえか 　死してなお　私の意識は 　ここに　留まりつづけているのさ。
「……さて　君たちに　助言してあげよう。 　この研究所には　ある呪いが　かけられている。
「それは……精神力が　減っていくという呪い。
「精神力が減ると　最大ＨＰが減少したり…… 　幻覚が　見えてしまうようになるんだ。
「呪いについて　くわしく知りたければ 　私の前にあるメモを　読むといいよ。
trans-unit.source:
What's this? A lost lamb, perhaps? Welcome to Balmeschke's laboratory.
Heh, heh... Here. Right here. There's a corpse lying right in front of you, isn't there?
That was once me. When Balmeschke was Demon Lord, this is the fate of a thief who broke in and was captured...
Even after my death, my conciousness has been here ever since...was it because of my regrets or his magic?
...Now, let me give you some advice. This laboratory is cursed.
That is...a curse that destroys your sanity.
When your sanity goes down, so does your maximum HP...and you'll start to see hallucinations, too.
If you want to know more, then you should check out that note in front of me.
trans-unit.target:
What's this? A lost lamb, perhaps? Welcome to Balmeschke's laboratory.
Heh, heh... Here. Right here. There's a corpse lying right in front of you, isn't there?
That was once me. When Balmeschke was Demon Lord, this is the fate of a thief who broke in and was captured...
Even after my death, my conciousness has been here ever since...was it because of my regrets or his magic?
...Now, let me give you some advice. This laboratory is cursed.

If you want to know more, then you should check out that note in front of me.

trans-unit.resname:
「なんと　すばらしい！ 　そんな芸当が　できるのは　君が初めてだよ。
「これまで　何人かの　ゼクレスの王族が 　ここを訪れたが……逃げ帰るか　道半ばで 　心が壊れてしまったからね。フフフ……。
trans-unit.source:
How amazing! You're the first to be able to do such a thing.
Several members of the Zechres royal family have visited here in the past...but they either ran away, or their minds were
shattered halfway through... Ehehe...

「宝箱の中に　眠る魔物が　カギを持つ。 　南東の部屋にて　渦巻く道を　たどれ……だね。
「さっき　魔物を倒して　手に入れたカギは 　この扉を開けるものなんじゃないかな？
trans-unit.source:
I see! I know what's written on the door here.
"The treasure chest with the sleeping monster inside has the key. Follow the southeastern room's spiralling path."
I wonder if the key from that monster will open this door?
trans-unit.target:
I see! I know what's written on the door here.
"The treasure chest with the sleeping monster inside has the key. Follow the southeastern room's spiralling path."
I wonder if the key from that monster will open this door?

trans-unit.resname: バルメシュケのカギを使って 扉を開けますか？<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>
trans-unit.source: Use Balmeschke's Key to open the door?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>
trans-unit.target: Use Balmeschke's Key to open the door?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

context-group.context: バルメシュケのカギを使って 扉を開けますか？<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

trans-unit.resname:
は　扉のカギ穴に バルメシュケのカギを　差し込んでみた。
カギを回すと　手ごたえとともに カチリと音がした。 扉を開けることに　成功したようだ！
バルメシュケのカギは　光につつまれ 消えさってしまった……。
trans-unit.source:
inserts Balmeschke's Key into the keyhole.
The key turns with a click and some resistance. The door is successfully opened!
Balmeschke's Key is enveloped in light and vanishes...
trans-unit.target:
inserts Balmeschke's Key into the keyhole.
The key turns with a click and some resistance. The door is successfully opened!
Balmeschke's Key is enveloped in light and vanishes...

context-group.context:
は　扉のカギ穴に バルメシュケのカギを　差し込んでみた。

バルメシュケのカギは　光につつまれ 消えさってしまった……。

trans-unit.resname:
「やはり　この扉のカギだったんだね。
「しかし　扉についている　引っかきキズ…… 　ヒトのツメによる　もののようだ。 　いったい　どれほど　必死に…………。
「……ふう。先へ進もうか……。
trans-unit.source:
So it was the key to the door after all.
But the door had scratches on it...scratches from a person. Just how desperate were they to find it...?
Phew... Let's keep moving.
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.resname:
バルメシュケに　捕まった後 まずは食事をとれと　皿を出された。 食事と言われても　私には　何も見えないが……。
……メモの続きには　謎の記号や いくつもの線が　踊っている。には そこに意味を見出すことが　できなかった……。
trans-unit.source:
After Balmeschke captured me, he gave me a plate with some food. He said it was a meal, but I couldn't see anything...
The note is filled with mysterious symbols and markings... is clueless on how to make sense of any of it...

trans-unit.source: There are words carved into the ground. Read what they say?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>
trans-unit.target: There are words carved into the ground. Read what they say?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

context-group.context: 地面に 文字が刻まれている。 読んでみますか？<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

trans-unit.resname:
ゼクレス王家の末席に連なる　アタシは 他の王族を出し抜き　王となるために バルメシュケの魔道具を求め　ここに来た。
研究所内を漂う　死者の魂から　得た情報では どうやら　魔炎に包まれた　己の影を見つけた時 先へ進むための手がかりが　得られるらしい。
己の影とは　どういう意味なのか……？ ついぞ　それらしきものは 見つけることが　できなかった。
すでに　魔力は尽き　正気も保てそうにない。 アタシは　このまま ここで　終わるのだろうか……。
……文字の続きには　謎の記号や いくつもの線が　踊っている。には そこに意味を見出すことが　できなかった……。
trans-unit.source:
As a the lowest of the Zechres royal family, I came here in search of Balmeschke's magical item in hopes that I could surpass
my superiors and become its new ruler.
According to information I received by the dead spirits in this place, it appears that if I can find a shadow of myself engulfed in
flames, that will be a clue on how I can continue on.
What does it mean to find "a shadow of myself"...? I've been unable to find anything like it.
My magical power has already run dry, and I don't know how much longer I can keep my sanity...
I wonder if this where I'll meet my end...
The note is filled with mysterious symbols and markings... is clueless on how to make sense of any of it...
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.resname:
「　そこに　何か見えるのかい？ 　僕には　何も見えないけど……
「……いや　待ってくれ。 　君の肉体から　この研究所を包むのと　同じ…… 　おそらく　バルメシュケの魔力を感じるよ。
「もしかしたら　君が　ここに来るまでに受けた 　バルメシュケの呪いの影響で 　見えないものが　見えているのかもしれないね。
trans-unit.source:
Do you see something there? I don't see anything...
No, wait...the power coming from your body... It's the same as that which surrounds the laboratory.
Perhaps because of the curse, you're seeing things that can't be seen otherwise.

trans-unit.resname:
「えっ！　何をして…………ッ！？
「の身体が　壁を　通り抜けた……？ 　そうか　この壁は　幻術なのか！ 　この僕さえも　あざむくなんて……。
「！ 　ちょっと　戻ってきてくれるかい？
trans-unit.source:
Huh?! How did you...?!
You passed right through the wall...? I see! This wall is just an illusion! To think it even deceived me...
Could you come back for a moment?
trans-unit.target:
Huh?! How did you...?!
You passed right through the wall...? I see! This wall is just an illusion! To think it even deceived me...
Could you come back for a moment?

context-group.context:
「えっ！　何をして…………ッ！？
「の身体が　壁を　通り抜けた……？ 　そうか　この壁は　幻術なのか！ 　この僕さえも　あざむくなんて……。
「！ 　ちょっと　戻ってきてくれるかい？

trans-unit.resname:
「……なるほど。通り抜けられるものだと 　認識するまでは　本物の壁と　寸分たがわず 　そこに　あり続ける……そういう魔術なのか。
「これは　いくつかの高度な術式を 　組み合わせて　実現しているようだね。 　くやしいが　見事な術だ……。
trans-unit.source:
I see...so until you recognize that it can be passed through, it remains indistinguishable from a real wall. So that's what magic it is.
It seems it was achieved from combining multiple types of spells. As frustrating as it is, it's pretty impressive...
trans-unit.target:
I see...so until you recognize that it can be passed through, it remains indistinguishable from a real wall. So that's what magic it is.
It seems it was achieved from combining multiple types of spells. As frustrating as it is, it's pretty impressive...

trans-unit.resname: <pipipi_npc 12156><force_turn_npc_to_pc 12567>「……ええと <pnplacehold>？ 大丈夫かい？<yesno><break>
trans-unit.source: <pipipi_npc 12156><force_turn_npc_to_pc 12567>Um, <pnplacehold>... Are you okay?<yesno><break>
trans-unit.target: <pipipi_npc 12156><force_turn_npc_to_pc 12567>Um, <pnplacehold>... Are you okay?<yesno><break>

context-group.context: <pipipi_npc 12156><force_turn_npc_to_pc 12567>「……ええと <pnplacehold>？ 大丈夫かい？<yesno><break>

trans-unit.resname:
「うーん……聞いておいて　なんだけど 　目は充血しているし　息も不自然に荒いし 　大丈夫では　なさそうだね。
「でも　この術を　破れたのは 　今の君の精神状態の　おかげのようだ。
「君の目に　何が見えていたのかは 　わからないが……君が　壁を通り抜けなければ 　僕が　幻術に気づくことは　なかっただろうね。
「ともかく　これで　先へ進めるよ！
trans-unit.source:
Hmm...I did ask, but your eyes are bloodshot and your breathing is unnaturally heavy. You don't seem to be okay.
But...it appears your current sanity is what allowed you to see through the spell.
I don't know what you see, but if you hadn't passed through the wall, I probably would have never noticed the illusion.
Anywaysーwe can move ahead now!
trans-unit.target:
Hmm...I did ask, but your eyes are bloodshot and your breathing is unnaturally heavy. You don't seem to be okay.

そこにある　しかばねは　だ。

trans-unit.resname:
もぞもぞと動く　袋が見える。
袋の前にはメモが　置かれている。 読んでみますか？
trans-unit.source:
The bag is moving around.
A note is in front of the bag. Read what it says?
trans-unit.target:
The bag is moving around.
A note is in front of the bag. Read what it says?

context-group.context:
もぞもぞと動く　袋が見える。
袋の前にはメモが　置かれている。 読んでみますか？

trans-unit.resname:
きょうも　ごしゅじんさまから おいしいごはんを　もらう。
きょうの　めにゅーは しんせんな　おにく。
そう　おもっていたのに きょうの　ごはんが　まだ　こない。 ねえ　ごはん　まだ？　おなかすいたよ？
trans-unit.source:
Today, I got some delicious food from my master.
Today's menu was fresh meat.
Well, that's what I thought, but dinner's not here yet. Hey, is dinner ready? I'm so hungry...
trans-unit.target:
Today, I got some delicious food from my master.
Today's menu was fresh meat.
Well, that's what I thought, but dinner's not here yet. Hey, is dinner ready? I'm so hungry...

trans-unit.resname:
……ああ　そっか！ おまえが　きょうの　ごはんなんだね。 しんせんで　おいしそう。
いただきまーす！
trans-unit.source: ...Oh! I see now! YOU are today's dinner. You look absolutely scrumptious. Time to dig in!
trans-unit.target: ...Oh! I see now! YOU are today's dinner. You look absolutely scrumptious. Time to dig in!

context-group.context:
……ああ　そっか！ おまえが　きょうの　ごはんなんだね。 しんせんで　おいしそう。
いただきまーす！

trans-unit.resname:
檻の中で　骨が　鉄格子をつかんでいる。 恨めしそうに　こちらを見つめる視線を感じる。
檻の前にはメモが　貼られている。 読んでみますか？
trans-unit.source:
Inside the cage, a skeleton clutches the iron bars. You feel it staring at you with a sense of resentment.
A note is pinned to the front of the cage. Read what it says?
trans-unit.target:
Inside the cage, a skeleton clutches the iron bars. You feel it staring at you with a sense of resentment.

trans-unit.resname:
メザメルト　ガイコツニ　ナッテイタ。
オリノ　マエノ　キミニ チョットシタ　テイアンガ　アルンダ。
ネエ　キミノ　カラダヲ　ボクニ　チョウダイ？ サア……ボクノ　メヲ　ノゾイテ……
メモは　そこで　終わっていた。
trans-unit.source:
WHEN I WOKE UP, I HAD BECOME A SKELETON.
YOU, IN FRONT OF ME. I HAVE A TINY PROPOSAL FOR YOU.
SAY, CAN I HAVE YOUR BODY? OKAY, JUST NEED TO TAKE OUT MY EYES AND...
The note ends there.

YOU, IN FRONT OF ME. I HAVE A TINY PROPOSAL FOR YOU.

オリノ　マエノ　キミニ チョットシタ　テイアンガ　アルンダ。

trans-unit.resname:
皿に　おいしそうな料理が　盛りつけられている。
皿の前にはメモが　置かれている。 読んでみますか？
trans-unit.source:
Delicious looking food is served on a plate.
A note is in front of the plate. Read what it says?
trans-unit.target:
Delicious looking food is served on a plate.
A note is in front of the plate. Read what it says?

context-group.context:
皿に　おいしそうな料理が　盛りつけられている。
皿の前にはメモが　置かれている。 読んでみますか？

trans-unit.resname:
バルメシュケに　捕まった後 まずは食事をとれと　皿を出された。 食事と言われても　私には　何も見えないが……。
しかし　バルメシュケが　杖を掲げると 突如　おいしそうな料理が　現れた。
何かが　おかしい……そう感じているはずなのに なぜか私は　料理をむさぼり　平らげていた。
食事のあとの　空き皿を見て　ぼんやり思う。
……この細長い尻尾は　いったい？ たしか　この皿には 肉料理が盛られていたはずだが……。
……メモは　そこで　終わっていた。
trans-unit.source:
After Balmeschke captured me, he gave me a plate with some food. He said it was a meal, but I couldn't see anything...
But when he raised his staff, a delicious meal appeared right in front of me.
I knew something felt off, but...I couldn't help myself. I devoured that food.
Looking at the empty plate, I wondered...
What is this long, thin tail...? Surely the plate was supposed to have meat on it...
...The note ends there.
trans-unit.target:
After Balmeschke captured me, he gave me a plate with some food. He said it was a meal, but I couldn't see anything...
But when he raised his staff, a delicious meal appeared right in front of me.
I knew something felt off, but...I couldn't help myself. I devoured that food.
Looking at the empty plate, I wondered...
What is this long, thin tail...? Surely the plate was supposed to have meat on it...
...The note ends there.

context-group.context:
バルメシュケに　捕まった後 まずは食事をとれと　皿を出された。 食事と言われても　私には　何も見えないが……。
しかし　バルメシュケが　杖を掲げると 突如　おいしそうな料理が　現れた。
何かが　おかしい……そう感じているはずなのに なぜか私は　料理をむさぼり　平らげていた。
食事のあとの　空き皿を見て　ぼんやり思う。
……この細長い尻尾は　いったい？ たしか　この皿には 肉料理が盛られていたはずだが……。
……メモは　そこで　終わっていた。

trans-unit.resname:
ゼクレス王家の末席に連なる　アタシは 他の王族を出し抜き　王となるために バルメシュケの魔道具を求め　ここに来た。
研究所内を漂う　死者の魂から　得た情報では どうやら　魔炎に包まれた　己の影を見つけた時 先へ進むための手がかりが　得られるらしい。
己の影とは　どういう意味なのか……？ ついぞ　それらしきものは 見つけることが　できなかった。
すでに　魔力は尽き　正気も保てそうにない。 アタシは　このまま ここで　終わるのだろうか……。
薄れゆく意識の中　ずっと南東の方から この身を射抜く　強烈な視線を感じた。
しかし　アタシには　もう そこまで行ける　チカラは残っていない……。
……文字は　そこで　終わっていた。
trans-unit.source:
As the lowest of the Zechres royal family, I came here in search of Balmeschke's magical item in hopes that I could surpass
my superiors and become its new ruler.
According to information I received by the dead spirits in this place, it appears that if I can find a shadow of myself engulfed in
flames, that will be a clue on how I can continue on.
What does it mean to find ""a shadow of myself""...? I've been unable to find anything like it.
My magical power has already run dry, and I don't know how much longer I can keep my sanity...
Am I going to die here?
With my conciousness fading, I felt a sharp and intense gaze pierce my soul from the southeast...
But I no longer have the strength to see what it might be...
...The text ends there.
trans-unit.target:

My magical power has already run dry, and I don't know how much longer I can keep my sanity...

With my conciousness fading, I felt a sharp and intense gaze pierce my soul from the southeast...
But I no longer have the strength to see what it might be...
...The text ends there.

研究所内を漂う　死者の魂から　得た情報では どうやら　魔炎に包まれた　己の影を見つけた時 先へ進むための手がかりが　得られるらしい。
己の影とは　どういう意味なのか……？ ついぞ　それらしきものは 見つけることが　できなかった。
すでに　魔力は尽き　正気も保てそうにない。 アタシは　このまま ここで　終わるのだろうか……。
薄れゆく意識の中　ずっと南東の方から この身を射抜く　強烈な視線を感じた。
しかし　アタシには　もう そこまで行ける　チカラは残っていない……。
……文字は　そこで　終わっていた。

trans-unit.resname:
返事がない。 ただの　しかばねのようだ……。
よく見ると　南東を向いて　倒れている。
trans-unit.source:
There's no response. It's just a corpse...
Looking closer, it appears to be facing to the southeast.
trans-unit.target:
There's no response. It's just a corpse...
Looking closer, it appears to be facing to the southeast.

context-group.context:
返事がない。 ただの　しかばねのようだ……。
よく見ると　南東を向いて　倒れている。

trans-unit.resname:
床の目が　見つめてくる。
床に殴り書きされた　メモを見つけた。
侵入者に突き刺さり　精神を汚染したうえで ＭＰを吸収し　研究所の魔力リソースとして 利用するために　作られた触手針。
トラマナミストでも　防げぬように 改良の実験を重ねたが　失敗。
白く変色し　すべての機能を失った。 トラマナミストだけは　どうにもならなかった。 ……と書かれている。
床の目が　恨めしそうに こちらを見つめてから目を閉じた。
trans-unit.source:
The eyes on the floor stare at you.
There's a note scribbled on the floor.
"These tentacle needles were designed to pierce through intruders, contaminate their minds, and drain their MP, which would be
used as a magical resource for the laboratory.
I tried many experiments to improve them, so that even Safe Passage Spray could not nullify themーbut I failed.
They turned white, and lost all their function. Only the Safe Passage Spray couldn't be dealt with."
...That's what it says.
The eyes on the floor stare with resent, then close.
trans-unit.target:
The eyes on the floor stare at you.
There's a note scribbled on the floor.
"These tentacle needles were designed to pierce through intruders, contaminate their minds, and drain their MP, which would be
used as a magical resource for the laboratory.
I tried many experiments to improve them, so that even Safe Passage Spray could not nullify themーbut I failed.
They turned white, and lost all their function. Only the Safe Passage Spray couldn't be dealt with."
...That's what it says.
The eyes on the floor stare with resent, then close.

trans-unit.target: <pnplacehold> could bear it no longer and runs away!<se_nots Joutyu_SE 36>

context-group.context: <pnplacehold>は たまらず そばから にげだした！<se_nots Joutyu_SE 36>

trans-unit.resname:
愛する妻と　隔離され どれぐらいの月日が　流れたのだろう。 私は　明日　別の牢屋に移されるらしい。
目の前には　女の絵が　飾られている。
なんと　醜い女だ！ 見ていると　気分が悪くなってくる。 一刻も早く　牢を移りたい。
……いや　違う！ 私は　何を考えている！？ これは　妻の絵ではないか！
ほほえむ彼女に　一目ぼれした。 心から愛した　ただひとりの女性だ。 それなのに　私は……。
バルメシュケが　杖を掲げるたび 謎の肉や液体を　クチにさせられるたび 私は　私でなくなっていく。
正気と記憶を保つために　記録が欠かせない。 さいわい　紙とペンならば　好きなだけ 与えられる。妻のことも　決して忘れるものか。
……しかし　目の前に飾られている　女の絵は ひどく不快だ！　こんなにも醜く　忌々しい女など 初めて見た。実在しているのだろうか？
……メモは　そこで　終わっていた。
trans-unit.source:
I wonder how much time has passed since I was separated from my beloved wife... I'm to be moved to another cell tomorrow.
In front of me are pictures of a woman.
What a hideous woman! Just looking at her makes me sick! I want to move to a different cell right now!
...No, that's not right! What am I thinking?! These are pictures of my wife!
I fell in love the first time I saw her smiling face. She's the only woman I've ever loved with all my heart. And yet...
Every time Balmeschke raises his staff, I'm forced to eat some strange meat or liquid. It makes me lose myself.
Recording this is essential to keeping my memories and my sanity. Fortunately, I am given as much pen and paper as I want.
I will never, ever forget my wife.
But the pictures in front of me...they're so unpleasant! I have never seen such an ugly and repulsive woman in my entire life.
Could such a woman truly exist?
...The note ends there.

But the pictures in front of me...they're so unpleasant! I have never seen such an ugly and repulsive woman in my entire life.
Could such a woman truly exist?

冷たい何かが　指先を　なめまわす……。 は　とりはだが立ってしまった！
は　スライムゼリーを　手に入れた！
trans-unit.source:
sticks their hand into the pot.
Something cold licks their fingertips... shivers with goosebumps!
receives a Slimedrop!
trans-unit.target:
sticks their hand into the pot.

trans-unit.resname: 床の上に いびつな文字が書かれている。 読んでみますか？<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>
trans-unit.source: Some distorted words are written on the floor. Read what they say?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>
trans-unit.target: Some distorted words are written on the floor. Read what they say?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

context-group.context: 床の上に いびつな文字が書かれている。 読んでみますか？<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

trans-unit.resname:
私は　殺された。
バルメシュケに　操られた 愛する夫に　殺された。
気がつくと　私は この研究所に根付く　異形の植物になっていた。
……文字の続きには　謎の記号や いくつもの線が　踊っている。には そこに意味を見出すことが　できなかった……。
trans-unit.source:
I was murdered.
Killed by my beloved husband, who had been manipulated by Balmeschke.
The next thing I knew, I became a strange plant that had taken root inside the laboratory.
The words are filled with mysterious symbols and markings... is clueless on how to make sense of any of it...
trans-unit.target:
I was murdered.
Killed by my beloved husband, who had been manipulated by Balmeschke.
The next thing I knew, I became a strange plant that had taken root inside the laboratory.
The words are filled with mysterious symbols and markings... is clueless on how to make sense of any of it...

context-group.context:
私は　殺された。
バルメシュケに　操られた 愛する夫に　殺された。
気がつくと　私は この研究所に根付く　異形の植物になっていた。
……文字の続きには　謎の記号や いくつもの線が　踊っている。には そこに意味を見出すことが　できなかった……。

trans-unit.resname:
私は　殺された。
バルメシュケに　操られた 愛する夫に　殺された。
気がつくと　私は この研究所に根付く　異形の植物になっていた。
この死体安置所で　すべてに絶望し 私の名を　つぶやき続ける夫を　見つけた。 バルメシュケの支配からは　解放されたようだ。
私は　無数のツタで　やさしく彼を包み込む。
異形の　本能なのか 私自身のすべてを　種にして 彼に　植え付けた。
私は　花を咲かす。 彼を苗床に　赤い赤い花を咲かす。
ああ　これで　私は…… いいえ　私たちは　いつも一緒。 もう二度と　離れない。離れるものか。
　
は　な　さ　な　い。
……文字は　そこで　終わっていた。
trans-unit.source:
I was murdered.
Killed by my beloved husband, who had been manipulated by Balmeschke.
The next thing I knew, I became a strange plant that had taken root inside the laboratory.
I found my husband in this morgue. He was in despair over everything that happened, and continued to mutter my name.
It seems that he was finally free of Balmeschke's control. I gently wrapped him in countless vines.
Perhaps its the instinct of this twisted form, but I used everything of myself to become a seed and planted it inside of him.
I make flowers bloom. On his body, a bed of seedlings, red flowers bloom.
Ah, now I... No. We are always together. We will never be apart again. I will never leave you.
I will not let you go.
...The text ends there.
trans-unit.target:
I was murdered.
Killed by my beloved husband, who had been manipulated by Balmeschke.
The next thing I knew, I became a strange plant that had taken root inside the laboratory.
I found my husband in this morgue. He was in despair over everything that happened, and continued to mutter my name.
It seems that he was finally free of Balmeschke's control. I gently wrapped him in countless vines.
Perhaps its the instinct of this twisted form, but I used everything of myself to become a seed and planted it inside of him.
I make flowers bloom. On his body, a bed of seedlings, red flowers bloom.
Ah, now I... No. We are always together. We will never be apart again. I will never leave you.
I will not let you go.
...The text ends there.

ああ　これで　私は…… いいえ　私たちは　いつも一緒。 もう二度と　離れない。離れるものか。

trans-unit.resname: どこからともなく 男の声が 響いてきた……。
trans-unit.source: A man's voice echoes from afar...
trans-unit.target: A man's voice echoes from afar...

context-group.context: どこからともなく 男の声が 響いてきた……。

trans-unit.resname:
子孫よ……よくぞ　ここまで　たどり着いた。
お前にならば　我が魔道具を　与えよう。
さあ　この先へ進め。
そこにある　水晶球を　手にするがいい……。
trans-unit.source:
You've done well to come this far, my descendant...
Now, proceed forward. Take the crystal ball you find there...
trans-unit.target:
You've done well to come this far, my descendant...
Now, proceed forward. Take the crystal ball you find there...

trans-unit.resname:
石像になってしまった　グランゼニス神だ。
が　いくら　呼びかけても グランゼニス神は　眉ひとつ　動かさない……。
trans-unit.source:
Gran Zenith stands here as a stone statue.
No matter how much calls out to him, he doesn't budge one bit.
trans-unit.target:
Gran Zenith stands here as a stone statue.
No matter how much calls out to him, he doesn't budge one bit.

context-group.context:
石像になってしまった　グランゼニス神だ。
が　いくら　呼びかけても グランゼニス神は　眉ひとつ　動かさない……。

trans-unit.resname:
「……あっ！　ごめん　。 　ちょっと　ぼーっとしちゃってたよ。
「いや～　ネーしゃまが　グラさんを 　石像に変えちゃうなんて　びっくりだよね！
「グラさんを　元に戻す方法は 　シオくんが探すって　言ってたね。 　見つかるといいよねっ！
「……ホントにさ。なんで　ネーしゃまは…… 　あんな　ひどいことを…………。
「……あたしなんかが　考えたって 　意味ないよね。！　気分転換に 　おいしいものでも　食べにいこーよ！
trans-unit.source:
Ah! Sorry, . I was zoning out for a second there.
I can't believe that Zenny would turn Mr. Gran into a stone statue!
Shio said he'd find a way to turn him back. I hope he does soon!
But, seriously... Why would Zenny... do such a terrible thing...?
Well, there's no point in thinking about it now. Come on, let's go eat something tasty to lighten the mood!
trans-unit.target:
Ah! Sorry, . I was zoning out for a second there.
I can't believe that Zenny would turn Mr. Gran into a stone statue!
Shio said he'd find a way to turn him back. I hope he does soon!
But, seriously... Why would Zenny... do such a terrible thing...?
Well, there's no point in thinking about it now. Come on, let's go eat something tasty to lighten the mood!

context-group.context:
「……あっ！　ごめん　。 　ちょっと　ぼーっとしちゃってたよ。

「……あたしなんかが　考えたって 　意味ないよね。！　気分転換に 　おいしいものでも　食べにいこーよ！

trans-unit.resname:
「ラキは　シオンに 　たくさん　ごめんなさいをした…… 　ねえさまが　ひどいことをしたから。
「シオンは　ラキは悪くないと言って 　天馬の姿で　飛び去っていった。
「ポルテは　すごく　ショックだったみたい……。 　ひとことも　しゃべらなくて 　ラキが　この家まで　連れて帰ってきた。
「ラキは……神に祈りたい。 　でも　ちいねえさまも　グラさんも……。
「……ポルテは　と　おでかけすると 　いつも　ごきげんで帰ってくる。 　……ポルテを　元気にしてあげて。
trans-unit.source:
Lycae apologized a lot to Shion because of the terrible thing his sister did...
Shion said that it wasn't Lycae's fault, and flew away in his Pegasus form.
Porte seemed so surprised... Lycae brought her back here without either of us saying a word.
Lycae...he wants to pray to the gods... But...his sister...and Mr. Gran...
Whenever Porte goes out with you, she always comes back in a good mood.
... Please cheer her up.
trans-unit.target:
Lycae apologized a lot to Shion because of the terrible thing his sister did...
Shion said that it wasn't Lycae's fault, and flew away in his Pegasus form.
Porte seemed so surprised... Lycae brought her back here without either of us saying a word.
Lycae...he wants to pray to the gods... But...his sister...and Mr. Gran...
Whenever Porte goes out with you, she always comes back in a good mood.
... Please cheer her up.

「ラキは　シオンに 　たくさん　ごめんなさいをした…… 　ねえさまが　ひどいことをしたから。
